trans-unit.target: 下表顯示這個方法中是否有提供各種不同的工作群組模式。

trans-unit.source: Workgroup mode
trans-unit.target: 工作群組模式

trans-unit.source: Available
trans-unit.target: 可用

trans-unit.source: Local computer
trans-unit.target: 本機電腦

trans-unit.source: Yes
Local computer and direct format name
trans-unit.target: 本機電腦，並直接格式名稱

trans-unit.source: Yes
Remote computer
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Remote computer and direct format name
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦並直接格式名稱

trans-unit.source: Yes
The following code example creates an asynchronous receive operation.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立非同步接收作業。

trans-unit.source: The code example creates an event handler, `MyReceiveCompleted`, and attaches it to the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted> event handler delegate.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例會建立事件處理常式， `MyReceiveCompleted`，並將它附加至<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted>事件處理常式委派。

trans-unit.source: The code example sends a message to a local message queue, then calls <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%28System.TimeSpan%2CSystem.Object%29>, passing in a time-out value of ten seconds and a unique integer that identifies that particular message.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例傳送訊息至本機訊息佇列，然後呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%28System.TimeSpan%2CSystem.Object%29>，並傳入逾時值為 10 秒，並識別該特定訊息的唯一整數。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted> event is raised, the event handler receives the message and writes the message body and the integer message identifier to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted>就會引發事件，事件處理常式會接收訊息，並將訊息內文和整數訊息識別項寫入至螢幕。

trans-unit.source: The value specified for the <paramref name="timeout" /> parameter is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 指定給 <paramref name="timeout" /> 參數的值無效。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a Message Queuing method.
trans-unit.target: 存取訊息佇列方法時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The method is not thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不是安全執行緒。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that indicates the interval of time to wait for a message to become available.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />，指出等待訊息變成可以使用的時間間隔。

trans-unit.source: A state object, specified by the application, that contains information associated with the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式指定的狀態物件，包含與非同步作業相關的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> that will receive the notification of the asynchronous operation completion.
trans-unit.target: 會接收非同步作業完成通知的 <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" />。

trans-unit.source: Initiates an asynchronous receive operation that has a specified time-out and a specified state object, which provides associated information throughout the operation's lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 啟始有指定逾時和指定狀態物件的非同步接收作業，會在作業的整個存留期內提供相關的資訊。

trans-unit.source: This overload receives notification, through a callback, of the identity of the event handler for the operation.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載會透過回呼，接收作業的事件處理常式的識別通知。

trans-unit.source: The operation is not complete until either a message becomes available in the queue or the time-out occurs.
trans-unit.target: 在訊息可以於佇列中使用或發生逾時之後，作業才會完成。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that identifies the posted asynchronous request.
trans-unit.target: 識別傳送的非同步要求的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />。

trans-unit.source: When you use this overload, the callback specified in the callback parameter is invoked directly when a message becomes available in the queue or when the specified interval of time has expired; the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted> event is not raised.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用這個多載時，回呼參數中指定的回呼會直接叫用時可用的訊息佇列中，或指定的時間間隔已過期。<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted>不會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The other overloads of <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A> rely on this component to raise the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 其他多載的<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A>依賴此元件引發<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted>事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted> is also raised if a message already exists in the queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted> 也會引發在佇列中已有的訊息。

trans-unit.source: To use <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A>, create an event handler that processes the results of the asynchronous operation and associate it with your event delegate.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A>、 建立事件處理常式處理非同步作業的結果，以及其關聯事件委派。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A> initiates an asynchronous receive operation; the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> is notified, through the raising of the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted> event, when a message arrives in the queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A> 啟始的非同步接收作業。<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>通知，透過引發<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted>當訊息抵達佇列中時引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> can then access the message by calling <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29> or retrieving the result using the <xref:System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>可以存取訊息藉由呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29>或擷取結果使用<xref:System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A> method returns immediately, but the asynchronous operation is not completed until the event handler is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A>方法會立即傳回，但在呼叫事件處理常式之前未完成非同步作業。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A> is asynchronous, you can call it to receive a message from the queue without blocking the current thread of execution.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A>是非同步，您可以呼叫它來從佇列接收訊息，而不會封鎖目前的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: To synchronously receive a message, use the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要以同步方式接收訊息，使用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Once an asynchronous operation completes, you can call <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginPeek%2A> or <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A> again in the event handler to keep receiving notifications.
trans-unit.target: 非同步作業完成之後，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginPeek%2A>或<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A>再次在事件處理常式可繼續接收通知。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A> returns identifies the asynchronous operation that the method started.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult> ，<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A>傳回識別方法開始非同步作業。

trans-unit.source: You can use this <xref:System.IAsyncResult> throughout the lifetime of the operation, although you generally do not use it until <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29> is called.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個<xref:System.IAsyncResult>存留期中的作業，雖然您通常不會使用它之前<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29>呼叫。

trans-unit.source: However, if you start several asynchronous operations, you can place their <xref:System.IAsyncResult> values in an array and specify whether to wait for all operations or any operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您啟動數個非同步作業，您可以將其<xref:System.IAsyncResult>陣列中的值，並指定是否要等候所有作業或完成任何作業。

trans-unit.source: In this case, you use the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncWaitHandle%2A> property of the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> to identify the completed operation.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，您使用<xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncWaitHandle%2A>屬性<xref:System.IAsyncResult>來識別已完成的作業。

trans-unit.source: The state object associates state information with the operation.
trans-unit.target: 與此作業的狀態物件產生關聯的狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you call <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A> multiple times to initiate multiple operations, you can identify each operation through a separate state object that you define.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A>多次，以便起始多個作業，您可以識別每個作業，透過您定義個別的狀態物件。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the state object to pass information across process threads.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以將資訊傳遞多個處理序執行緒使用的狀態物件。

trans-unit.source: If a thread is started but the callback is on a different thread in an asynchronous scenario, the state object is marshaled and passed back along with information from the event.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行緒已啟動，但回呼是在不同的執行緒的非同步案例中，為狀態物件封送處理，從事件傳遞的資訊一起傳回。

trans-unit.source: Do not use the asynchronous call <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A> with transactions.
trans-unit.target: 請勿使用非同步呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A>與交易。

trans-unit.source: If you want to perform a transactional asynchronous operation, call <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginPeek%2A>, and put the transaction and the (synchronous) <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A> method within the event handler you create for the peek operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要執行的交易式的非同步作業，呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginPeek%2A>，且會將交易和 （同步）<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A>查看作業在您建立事件處理常式方法。

trans-unit.source: Your event handler might contain functionality as shown in the following C# code.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式可能包含的功能，如下列 C# 程式碼所示。

The following code example creates an asynchronous receive operation.

trans-unit.source: The code example sends a message to a local message queue, then calls <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%28System.TimeSpan%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.AsyncCallback%29>, passing in: a time-out value of ten seconds; a unique integer that identifies that particular message; and a new instance of <xref:System.AsyncCallback> that identifies the event handler, `MyReceiveCompleted`.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> that receives the notification of the asynchronous operation completion.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" />，接收非同步作業的完成通知。

trans-unit.source: Initiates an asynchronous receive operation that has a specified time-out and uses a specified cursor and a specified state object.

trans-unit.source: The value specified for the <paramref name="timeout" /> parameter is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 指定給 <paramref name="timeout" /> 參數的值無效。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a Message Queuing method.
trans-unit.target: 存取訊息佇列方法時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The method is not thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不是安全執行緒。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> can be read.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否可讀取 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> exists and the application can read from it; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> 存在而且應用程式可以從它讀取，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.CanRead%2A> indicates whether the application is able to peek or receive messages from the queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.CanRead%2A> 指出應用程式是否能夠查看，或從佇列接收訊息。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.CanRead%2A> is `true`, the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> can receive or peek messages from the queue.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.CanRead%2A>是`true`、<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>可以接收或窺視佇列中的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it cannot.
trans-unit.target: 否則，不能。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.CanRead%2A> is `false` if a queue is already open with exclusive read access (or if it's open with non-exclusive access and this <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> requests exclusive access), or if the application does not have sufficient rights to access it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.CanRead%2A> 是`false`如果佇列已經開啟具有獨佔讀取存取權 (或者如果它是以非獨佔存取，而這開啟<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>要求獨佔存取權)，或如果應用程式沒有足夠的權限可以存取它。

trans-unit.source: If your application tries to read from a queue when <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.CanRead%2A> is `false`, access is denied.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式會嘗試從佇列讀取時<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.CanRead%2A>是`false`，存取被拒。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示此屬性是否可以使用各種不同的工作群組模式中。

trans-unit.source: Workgroup mode
trans-unit.target: 工作群組模式

trans-unit.source: Available
trans-unit.target: 可用

trans-unit.source: Local computer
trans-unit.target: 本機電腦

trans-unit.source: Yes
Local computer and direct format name
trans-unit.target: 本機電腦，並直接格式名稱

trans-unit.source: Yes
Remote computer
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Remote computer and direct format name
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦並直接格式名稱

trans-unit.source: Yes

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示的訊息佇列的值<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.CanRead%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> can be written to.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否可寫入 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> exists and the application can write to it; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> 存在，而且應用程式可以寫入它，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.CanWrite%2A> indicates whether the application is able to send messages to the queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.CanWrite%2A> 指出應用程式是否能夠將訊息傳送至佇列。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.CanWrite%2A> is `true`, the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> can send messages to the queue.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.CanWrite%2A>是`true`、<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>可以傳送訊息至佇列。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it cannot.
trans-unit.target: 否則，不能。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.CanWrite%2A> is `false` if a queue is already open with exclusive write access (or if it's open with non-exclusive access and this <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> requests exclusive access), or if the application does not have sufficient rights to access it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.CanWrite%2A> 是`false`如果佇列已開啟以獨佔寫入存取權 (或者如果它是以非獨佔存取，而這開啟<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>要求獨佔存取權)，或如果應用程式沒有足夠的權限可以存取它。

trans-unit.source: If your application tries to write to a queue when <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.CanWrite%2A> is `false`, access is denied.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式嘗試寫入至佇列時<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.CanWrite%2A>是`false`，存取被拒。

trans-unit.source: Yes

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Remote computer and direct format name

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the queue category.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定佇列分類。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that represents the queue category (Message Queuing type identifier), which allows an application to categorize its queues.
trans-unit.target: 表示佇列分類 (訊息佇列型別識別項) 的 <see cref="T:System.Guid" />，可讓應用程式將它的佇列分類。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="Guid.empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="Guid.empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The queue category allows an application to categorize its queues.
trans-unit.target: 佇列類別目錄可讓應用程式將其佇列分類。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can place all Billing queues in one category and all Order queues in another.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以在一個類別目錄和所有的訂單佇列，在另一個放置所有計費佇列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Category%2A> property provides access to the Message Queuing Type ID property (which is read/write), accessible through the **Queue Properties** dialog box in the Computer Management Console.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Category%2A>屬性可存取訊息佇列類型 ID 屬性 （這是讀取/寫入），可透過存取**佇列屬性** 對話方塊中 電腦管理 主控台。

trans-unit.source: You can define a new category.
trans-unit.target: 您可以定義新的類別。

trans-unit.source: Although you can use <xref:System.Guid.NewGuid%2A> to create a category value that is unique across all <xref:System.Guid> values, such an action is unnecessary.
trans-unit.target: 雖然您可以使用<xref:System.Guid.NewGuid%2A>來建立類別目錄的值，而且是唯一的所有<xref:System.Guid>值，這類動作都是不必要的。

trans-unit.source: The category value needs to be distinct only from other categories, not from all other <xref:System.Guid> values.
trans-unit.target: 類別目錄值必須是相異只能從其他類別，不是從所有其他<xref:System.Guid>值。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can assign {00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001} as the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Category%2A> for one set of queues and {00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000002} as the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Category%2A> for another set.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指派{00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001}做為<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Category%2A>佇列的一組和{00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000002}為<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Category%2A>另一個集。

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to set the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Category%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 不需要設定<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Category%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The value can be `null`.
trans-unit.target: 這個值可以是 `null`。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property modifies the Message Queuing queue.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性可以修改 「 訊息佇列 」 佇列。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, any other <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> instances are affected by the change.
trans-unit.target: 因此，任何其他<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>變更會影響執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Frees all resources allocated by the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> 配置的所有資源。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Close%2A> frees all resources associated with a <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>, including shared resources if appropriate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Close%2A> 釋放與相關聯的所有資源<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>，如果適當的話，包含共用資源。

trans-unit.source: The system re-acquires these resources automatically if they are still available, for example when you call the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%28System.Object%29> method, as in the following C# code.
trans-unit.target: 系統重新擷取這些資源自動是否仍然可用，例如當您呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%28System.Object%29>方法，如下列 C# 程式碼所示。

trans-unit.source: When you call <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Close%2A>, all <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> properties that directly access the Message Queuing queue are cleared out. The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A>, <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A>, <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Formatter%2A>, and <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MessageReadPropertyFilter%2A> all remain as they were.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Close%2A>，則所有<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>清除直接存取 「 訊息佇列 」 佇列的屬性。<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A>， <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A>， <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Formatter%2A>，和<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MessageReadPropertyFilter%2A>所有維持原狀。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Close%2A> does not always free the read and write handles to a queue, because they might be shared.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Close%2A> 不會不一定會釋放讀取並寫入至佇列，控點，因為可能會共用。

trans-unit.source: You can take any of the following steps to ensure that <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Close%2A> frees the read and write handles to a queue:
trans-unit.target: 您可以採取下列步驟以確保任何<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Close%2A>釋出至佇列的讀取和寫入控制代碼：

trans-unit.source: Create the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> with exclusive access.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>使用獨佔存取權。

trans-unit.source: To do so, call the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29> or <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%29> constructor, and set the `sharedModeDenyReceive` parameter to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做，請呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29>或<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%29>建構函式，以及組`sharedModeDenyReceive`參數`true`。

trans-unit.source: Create the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> with connection caching disabled.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>與停用快取的連接。

trans-unit.source: To do so, call the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%29> constructor and set the `enableConnectionCache` parameter to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做，請呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%29>建構函式和集合`enableConnectionCache`參數`false`。

trans-unit.source: Disable connection caching.
trans-unit.target: 停用連線快取。

trans-unit.source: To do so, set the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EnableConnectionCache%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做，請設定<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EnableConnectionCache%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: You should call <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Close%2A> for a queue before you delete the queue on the Message Queuing server.
trans-unit.target: 您應該呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Close%2A>佇列，然後再刪除訊息佇列伺服器上的佇列。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, messages sent to the queue could throw exceptions or appear in the dead-letter queue.
trans-unit.target: 否則，訊息傳送至佇列無法擲回例外狀況，或出現在寄不出信件佇列中。

trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個多載來建立異動式佇列中訊息佇列。

trans-unit.source: You can create a non-transactional queue, by setting the `transactional` parameter to `false` or by calling the other overload of <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Create%28System.String%29>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the message property values to be used by default when the application sends messages to the queue.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定應用程式傳送訊息至佇列時，會預設採用的訊息屬性值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Messaging.DefaultPropertiesToSend" /> that contains the default Message Queuing message property values used when the application sends objects other than <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> instances to the queue.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Messaging.DefaultPropertiesToSend" />，包含應用程式向佇列傳送 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> 執行個體以外的物件時，使用的預設 Message Queuing 訊息屬性值。

trans-unit.source: When you send any object that is not of type <xref:System.Messaging.Message> to the queue, the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> inserts the object into a Message Queuing message.
trans-unit.target: 當您將傳送的類型不是任何物件<xref:System.Messaging.Message>至佇列，<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>將物件插入至訊息佇列的訊息。

trans-unit.source: At that time, the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> applies to the message the property values you specify in the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在這段時間，<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>套用至訊息中指定的屬性值<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Conversely, if you send a <xref:System.Messaging.Message> to the queue, these properties are already specified for the instance itself, so <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A> is ignored for the <xref:System.Messaging.Message>.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，如果您傳送<xref:System.Messaging.Message>至佇列，這些屬性已指定執行個體本身，因此<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A>會忽略<xref:System.Messaging.Message>。

trans-unit.source: Although you set the properties through the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> object, the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A> refers to the properties of the messages that are sent to the queue, not the queue itself.
trans-unit.target: 雖然您可以設定屬性，透過<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>物件<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A>參考的訊息會傳送至佇列，而不佇列本身的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> has exclusive access to receive messages from the Message Queuing queue.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出這個 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> 是否具有從訊息佇列接收訊息的獨佔存取權。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> has exclusive rights to receive messages from the queue; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> 具有從佇列接收訊息的獨佔權限，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DenySharedReceive%2A> specifies the shared mode of the queue referenced by this <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DenySharedReceive%2A> 指定佇列所參考的共用的模式<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>。

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DenySharedReceive%2A> to `true` to indicate that only this <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> should have access to peek or receive messages from the queue with the specified <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DenySharedReceive%2A>至`true`來表示，只有這<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>應該查看，或從指定的佇列接收訊息的存取<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If another <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> or another application is associated with the same queue resource, that instance or application will not be able to peek or receive messages, but it can still send them.
trans-unit.target: 如果另一個<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>或另一個應用程式是相同的佇列資源，該執行個體相關聯的應用程式將無法再查看或接收訊息，但它仍然可以傳送它們。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DenySharedReceive%2A> is `false`, the queue is available to multiple applications for sending, peeking, or receiving messages.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DenySharedReceive%2A>是`false`，佇列可以使用多個應用程式傳送或其內，接收訊息。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) used by the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: 處置 (Dispose) <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> 所使用的資源 (除了記憶體之外)。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Dispose%28System.Boolean%29> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Dispose%28System.Boolean%29> 使用完畢時，請呼叫 <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Dispose%28System.Boolean%29> method leaves the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Dispose%28System.Boolean%29> 方法會將 <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> 保留在無法使用的狀態。

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Dispose%28System.Boolean%29>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> so the memory it was occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Dispose%28System.Boolean%29>，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>讓它所佔用的記憶體可由記憶體回收收回。

trans-unit.source: You should call <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Dispose%28System.Boolean%29> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>.
trans-unit.target: 您應該呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Dispose%28System.Boolean%29>您釋放最後一個參考之前<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> is using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> object's destructor.
trans-unit.target: 否則，資源<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>是使用之前，將不會釋放記憶體回收集合呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>物件的解構函式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a cache of connections will be maintained by the application.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出應用程式是否會維持連接的快取。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to create and use a connection cache; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示建立並使用連接快取，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A connection cache is a list of references to structures that contain read or write handles to queues.
trans-unit.target: 連接快取是一份結構包含讀取或寫入至佇列的控制代碼的參考。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EnableConnectionCache%2A> is `true`, the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> borrows handles from the cache each time you call <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%28System.Object%29>, <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A>, or <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A>, rather than open new handles.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EnableConnectionCache%2A>是`true`、<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>借用控點，從快取每次呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%28System.Object%29>， <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A>，或<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A>，而不是開啟新的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: This can improve performance.
trans-unit.target: 這可以改善效能。

trans-unit.source: Using a connection cache also insulates the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> from changes in the network topology.
trans-unit.target: 使用連線快取也會以隔離<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>網路拓撲中的變更。

trans-unit.source: If you create a new connection to a queue when the connection cache is full, the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> overwrites the least recently accessed structure with the new connection.
trans-unit.target: 如果您建立新的連接到佇列時的連線快取已滿，<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>至少最近存取的結構，使用覆寫新的連接。

trans-unit.source: You can clear the cache entirely by calling <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ClearConnectionCache%2A>, for example, if the format names of the queues you are working with have changed so that the previous read and write handles are no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: 您可以清除快取完全是藉由呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ClearConnectionCache%2A>，例如，如果您正在使用的佇列格式名稱已經變更，使先前的讀取和寫入控制代碼不再有效。

trans-unit.target: 下表顯示此屬性是否可以使用各種不同的工作群組模式中。

trans-unit.target: 本機電腦，並直接格式名稱

trans-unit.source: Yes

trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦

trans-unit.source: Yes
Remote computer and direct format name
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦並直接格式名稱

trans-unit.source: Yes
The following code example gets and sets the value of a message queue's <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EnableConnectionCache%2A> property.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the queue accepts only non-private (non-encrypted) messages.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出佇列是否只接受非私用 (不加密的) 訊息。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.EncryptionRequired" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.EncryptionRequired" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="None" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="None" />。

trans-unit.source: When you specify that encryption is required for the messages sent to a queue, only the message bodies are encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 當您指定需要傳送至佇列的訊息加密時，則會加密訊息內文。

trans-unit.source: The other members (for example, the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Label%2A> and <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId%2A> properties) cannot be encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 其他成員 (例如，<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Label%2A>和<xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId%2A>屬性) 無法加密。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property modifies the Message Queuing queue.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性可以修改 「 訊息佇列 」 佇列。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, any other <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> instances are affected by the change.
trans-unit.target: 因此，任何其他<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>變更會影響執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Encrypting a message makes the message private.
trans-unit.target: 加密的訊息，可讓訊息私用。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the queue's encryption requirement to be `None`, `Body`, or `Optional` by setting the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EncryptionRequired%2A> property appropriately.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定佇列的加密需求是`None`， `Body`，或`Optional`藉由設定<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EncryptionRequired%2A>屬性適當地。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseEncryption%2A> setting of the message must correspond to the encryption requirement of the queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseEncryption%2A>訊息的設定必須對應至佇列的加密需求。

trans-unit.source: If the message is not encrypted but the queue specifies `Body`, or if the message is encrypted but the queue specifies `None`, the message is rejected by the queue.
trans-unit.target: 如果訊息並未加密，但佇列指定`Body`，或者如果訊息已加密，但佇列指定`None`，佇列將會拒絕訊息。

trans-unit.source: If the sending application requests a negative acknowledgment message in this event, Message Queuing indicates the message's rejection to the sending application.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳送應用程式要求在此事件的負值通知訊息，訊息佇列指出傳送應用程式的訊息被拒絕。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseDeadLetterQueue%2A> property is `true`, a message that fails encryption is sent to the dead-letter queue.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseDeadLetterQueue%2A>屬性是`true`，失敗加密的訊息傳送至寄不出信件佇列。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the message is lost.
trans-unit.target: 否則，訊息就會遺失。

trans-unit.source: Yes
Remote computer

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦並直接格式名稱

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: The following code example gets and sets the value of a message queue's <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EncryptionRequired%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會取得並設定訊息佇列的值<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EncryptionRequired%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a Message Queuing method.
trans-unit.target: 存取訊息佇列方法時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that identifies the asynchronous peek operation to finish and from which to retrieve an end result.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />，識別要完成的非同步窺視作業，並要從其中擷取最終結果。

trans-unit.source: Completes the specified asynchronous peek operation.
trans-unit.target: 完成指定的非同步窺視作業。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> associated with the completed asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 與完成的非同步作業相關的 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekCompleted> event is raised, <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndPeek%28System.IAsyncResult%29> completes the operation that was initiated by the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginPeek%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekCompleted>引發事件時，<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndPeek%28System.IAsyncResult%29>完成作業所起始的<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginPeek%2A>呼叫。

trans-unit.source: To do so, <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndPeek%28System.IAsyncResult%29> peeks the message.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做，<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndPeek%28System.IAsyncResult%29>窺視訊息。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginPeek%2A> can specify a time-out, which causes the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekCompleted> event to be raised if the time-out occurs before a message appears in the queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginPeek%2A> 可以指定逾時，這會導致<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekCompleted>逾時發生之前佇列會出現訊息。 如果要產生的事件。

trans-unit.source: When a time-out occurs without a message arriving in the queue, a subsequent call to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndPeek%28System.IAsyncResult%29> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 當沒有訊息抵達佇列的後續呼叫中發生逾時<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndPeek%28System.IAsyncResult%29>擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndPeek%28System.IAsyncResult%29> is used to read the message that caused the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekCompleted> event to be raised.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndPeek%28System.IAsyncResult%29> 用來讀取訊息造成<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekCompleted>會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: If you want to continue to asynchronously peek messages, you can again call <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginPeek%2A> after calling <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndPeek%28System.IAsyncResult%29>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要繼續將以非同步方式查看訊息，可以一次呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginPeek%2A>之後呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndPeek%28System.IAsyncResult%29>。

The following code example creates an event handler named `MyPeekCompleted`, attaches it to the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekCompleted> event handler delegate, and calls <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginPeek%2A> to initiate an asynchronous peek operation on the queue that is located at the path ".\myQueue".
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立名為事件處理常式`MyPeekCompleted`，將它附加至<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekCompleted>事件處理常式委派，並呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginPeek%2A>起始位於路徑上的佇列上的非同步窺視作業 」。 \myQueue"。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekCompleted> event is raised, the example peeks the message and writes its body to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekCompleted>就會引發事件，此範例窺視訊息，並將其本文寫入至螢幕。

trans-unit.source: The example then calls <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginPeek%2A> again to initiate a new asynchronous peek operation.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會接著呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginPeek%2A> 以起始新的非同步查看作業。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="asyncResult" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The syntax of the <paramref name="asyncResult" /> parameter is not valid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 參數的語法無效。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a Message Queuing method.
trans-unit.target: 存取訊息佇列方法時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that identifies the asynchronous receive operation to finish and from which to retrieve an end result.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />，識別要完成的非同步接收作業，並要從其中擷取最終結果。

trans-unit.source: Completes the specified asynchronous receive operation.
trans-unit.target: 完成指定的非同步接收作業。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> associated with the completed asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 與完成的非同步作業相關的 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted> event is raised, <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29> completes the operation that was initiated by the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted>引發事件時，<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29>完成作業所起始的<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A>呼叫。

trans-unit.source: To do so, <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29> receives the message.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做，<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29>接收訊息。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A> can specify a time-out, which causes the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted> event to be raised if the time-out occurs before a message appears in the queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A> 可以指定逾時，這會導致<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted>逾時發生之前佇列會出現訊息。 如果要產生的事件。

trans-unit.source: When a time-out occurs without a message arriving in the queue, a subsequent call to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 當沒有訊息抵達佇列的後續呼叫中發生逾時<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29>擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29> is used to read (removing from the queue) the message that caused the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted> event to be raised.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29> 用來讀取 （從佇列移除） 所造成的訊息<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted>會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: If you want to continue to asynchronously receive messages, you can again call <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A> after calling <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要繼續以非同步方式接收訊息，可以一次呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A>之後呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29>。

trans-unit.source: It assumes there is a queue on the local computer called "myQueue".
trans-unit.target: 它會假設稱為 「 myQueue 「 本機電腦上沒有佇列。

trans-unit.source: The `Main` function begins the asynchronous operation that is handled by the `MyReceiveCompleted` routine.
trans-unit.target: `Main`函式開始非同步作業，由`MyReceiveCompleted`常式。

trans-unit.source: `MyReceiveCompleted` processes the current message and begins a new asynchronous receive operation.
trans-unit.target: `MyReceiveCompleted` 處理目前的訊息，並開始新的非同步接收作業。

trans-unit.source: The location of the queue to find.
trans-unit.target: 要尋找的佇列位置。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a Message Queuing queue exists at the specified path.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定路徑上是否存在訊息佇列。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a queue with the specified path exists; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定路徑上的佇列存在則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Exists%28System.String%29> method determines whether a Message Queuing queue exists at a specified path.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Exists%28System.String%29>方法來判斷訊息佇列 」 佇列是否存在指定的路徑。

trans-unit.source: No method exists to determine whether a queue with a specified format name exists.
trans-unit.target: 沒有方法可用來判斷具有指定的格式名稱的佇列是否存在。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the format name syntax and other path syntax forms, see the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A> property.)
trans-unit.target: 如需有關格式名稱語法和其他路徑語法形式的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A>屬性。)

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Exists%28System.String%29> is an expensive operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Exists%28System.String%29> 是昂貴的作業。

trans-unit.source: Use it only when it is necessary within the application.
trans-unit.target: 只有在必要時在應用程式中，請使用它。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Exists%28System.String%29> method does not support the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.FormatName%2A> prefix.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Exists%28System.String%29>方法不支援<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.FormatName%2A>前置詞。

trans-unit.source: For more syntax, see the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需更多的語法，請參閱<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a Message Queuing method.

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <see cref="M:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Exists(System.String)" /> method is being called on a remote private queue
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Exists(System.String)" /> 方法會在遠端私用佇列上呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The application used format name syntax when verifying queue existence.
trans-unit.target: 確認佇列是否存在時，應用程式會使用格式名稱語法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the unique queue name that Message Queuing generated at the time of the queue's creation.
trans-unit.target: 取得訊息佇列在佇列建立時產生的唯一佇列名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name for the queue, which is unique on the network.
trans-unit.target: 在網路上唯一的佇列名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.FormatName%2A> property contains the format name of the queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.FormatName%2A>屬性包含佇列的格式名稱。

trans-unit.source: Message Queuing uses the format name to identify which queue to open and how to access it.
trans-unit.target: 訊息佇列使用的格式名稱來識別開啟的佇列，以及如何存取它。

trans-unit.source: Unlike most of a queue's characteristics, the format name is not a Message Queuing application queue property, so you cannot access it through the Message Queuing management tool.
trans-unit.target: 不同於大部分的佇列的特性，格式名稱不是訊息佇列應用程式佇列屬性，因此您無法透過訊息佇列的管理工具存取它。

trans-unit.source: The format name is simply a unique name for the queue, which Message Queuing generates when it creates the queue or which the application generates later.
trans-unit.target: 格式名稱是在佇列中，只是唯一的名稱建立佇列，或稍後再產生應用程式時，訊息佇列產生的。

trans-unit.source: If you specify a path using the path name syntax (such as `myComputer\myQueue`) rather than using the format name syntax when you read or write to the queue, the primary domain controller (which uses Active Directory) translates the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A> into the associated <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.FormatName%2A> before accessing the queue.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定使用的路徑名稱語法的路徑 (例如`myComputer\myQueue`) 而不是您讀取或寫入至佇列時，請使用格式名稱語法，在網域主控站 （這會使用 Active Directory） 將轉譯<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A>到相關聯的<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.FormatName%2A>之前存取佇列。

trans-unit.source: If your application is working offline, you must use the format name syntax; otherwise, the primary domain controller will not be available to perform the path translation.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式離線工作時，您必須使用格式名稱語法。否則，主要網域控制站將無法執行路徑轉譯。

trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦並直接格式名稱

trans-unit.source: Yes
The following code example displays the value of a message queue's <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.FormatName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示的訊息佇列的值<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.FormatName%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path" /> is not set.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path" /> 未設定。

trans-unit.source: -or-
An error occurred when accessing a Message Queuing method.
trans-unit.target: 存取訊息佇列方法時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the formatter used to serialize an object into or deserialize an object from the body of a message read from or written to the queue.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定對佇列寫入或讀取訊息時，用來將物件序列化成訊息主體，或者從訊息主體將物件還原序列化的格式子。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Messaging.IMessageFormatter" /> that produces a stream to be written to or read from the message body.
trans-unit.target: 產生要對訊息主體寫入或讀取的資料流的 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.IMessageFormatter" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="T:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Formatter%2A> property contains an instance of a formatter object, which transforms messages when your application reads or writes to the queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Formatter%2A>屬性包含格式子物件，您的應用程式讀取或寫入至佇列時，轉換訊息的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When the application sends message to the queue, the formatter serializes the object into a stream and inserts it into the message body.
trans-unit.target: 當應用程式傳送訊息至佇列時，格式器會將物件序列化成資料流，並將它插入訊息內文。

trans-unit.source: When reading from a queue, the formatter deserializes the message data into the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A> property of a <xref:System.Messaging.Message>.
trans-unit.target: 格式器時從佇列讀取時，會將訊息資料還原序列化<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>屬性<xref:System.Messaging.Message>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter> is loosely coupled, so it is not necessary to have the same object type on the sender and receiver when using this format.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>鬆散偶合，如此就不需要有相同的物件時使用此格式輸入上的寄件者和接收者。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.ActiveXMessageFormatter> and <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter> serialize the data into binary representation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.ActiveXMessageFormatter>和<xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter>將資料序列化為二進位表示法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.ActiveXMessageFormatter> is used when sending or receiving COM components.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.ActiveXMessageFormatter>傳送或接收的 COM 元件時使用。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter> and <xref:System.Messaging.ActiveXMessageFormatter> provide faster throughput than the <xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter> 和<xref:System.Messaging.ActiveXMessageFormatter>提供更快速的輸送量比<xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.ActiveXMessageFormatter> allows interoperability with Visual Basic 6.0 Message Queuing applications.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.ActiveXMessageFormatter>允許與 Visual Basic 6.0 訊息佇列應用程式的互通性。

trans-unit.source: When your application sends messages to the queue, the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Formatter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> applies only to those messages that use the default message properties, <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 當您的應用程式會將訊息傳送至佇列，<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Formatter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>只適用於使用預設的訊息屬性，這些訊息<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If you send a <xref:System.Messaging.Message> to the queue, Message Queuing uses the formatter defined in the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to serialize the body instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您傳送<xref:System.Messaging.Message>至佇列，訊息佇列使用中定義的格式器<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性改為序列化內文。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> class will always use a <xref:System.Messaging.Message> to receive or peek a message from the queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>類別一律會使用<xref:System.Messaging.Message>接收或窺視佇列中的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The message is deserialized using the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Formatter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用還原序列化訊息<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Formatter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.target: 下表顯示此屬性是否可以使用各種不同的工作群組模式中。

trans-unit.target: 工作群組模式

trans-unit.source: Available
trans-unit.target: 可用

trans-unit.source: Local computer
trans-unit.target: 本機電腦

trans-unit.source: Yes
Local computer and direct format name
trans-unit.target: 本機電腦，並直接格式名稱

trans-unit.source: Yes
Remote computer
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Remote computer and direct format name
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦並直接格式名稱

trans-unit.source: Yes

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範的格式化訊息本文會使用<xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter>。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the messages that are in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 傳回佇列中的所有訊息。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> that represents all the messages in the queue, in the same order as they appear in the Message Queuing queue.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> 型別的陣列，表示佇列中的所有訊息，順序與出現在訊息佇列中的順序一樣。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetAllMessages%2A> returns a static snapshot of the messages in the queue, not dynamic links to those messages.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetAllMessages%2A> 這些訊息傳回佇列中的訊息、 非動態連結的靜態快照集。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you cannot use the array to modify the messages in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您無法使用陣列，若要修改佇列中的訊息。

trans-unit.source: If you want real-time, dynamic interaction with the queue (such as the ability to delete messages), call the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetMessageEnumerator2%2A> method, which returns a dynamic list of the messages in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想即時、 動態互動 （例如，若要刪除訊息的能力） 佇列時，呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetMessageEnumerator2%2A>方法，這個方法會傳回佇列中訊息的動態清單。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetAllMessages%2A> returns a copy of the messages in the queue at the time the method was called, the array does not reflect new messages that arrive in the queue or messages that are removed from the queue.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetAllMessages%2A>呼叫此方法傳回佇列中訊息的複本時，陣列不會反映新的訊息到達佇列或從佇列中移除的訊息。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetAllMessages%2A> retrieves only those properties not filtered out by the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MessageReadPropertyFilter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetAllMessages%2A> 擷取尚未經過篩選的屬性<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MessageReadPropertyFilter%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the computer that contains the queue, without the two preceding backslashes (\\\\).
trans-unit.target: 包含佇列的電腦名稱，前端沒有兩條反斜線 (\\\\)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the identifier of the computer on which the queue referenced by this <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> is located.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> 參考之佇列所在位置的電腦識別項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that represents a unique identifier for the computer on which the queue is located.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Guid" />，表示佇列所在之電腦的唯一識別項。

trans-unit.source: You can use a computer's identifier for two purposes, among others: to read the computer journal and to set security certificates.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用電腦的識別碼有兩種用途，和其他項目： 讀取電腦日誌，並設定安全性憑證。

trans-unit.source: However, you cannot call <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetMachineId%28System.String%29> for a remote computer when you are working offline because the application must have access to the directory service on the domain controller.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您不能呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetMachineId%28System.String%29>遠端電腦，當您離線工作因為應用程式必須具有網域控制站上的目錄服務的存取權。

trans-unit.source: The computer identifier (or machine identifier) is a <xref:System.Guid> that Message Queuing creates when a computer is added to the enterprise.
trans-unit.target: 電腦識別元 （或電腦的識別項） 是<xref:System.Guid>訊息佇列時，會建立將電腦新增至企業。

trans-unit.source: Message Queuing combines the computer identifier with the `Machine` and `Journal` keywords to create the machine journal's format name, which has the syntax `Machine=<computeridentifier>;Journal`.
trans-unit.target: 訊息佇列的結合電腦識別項與`Machine`和`Journal`關鍵字來建立電腦日誌的格式名稱，其語法`Machine=<computeridentifier>;Journal`。

trans-unit.source: The machine journal, which is also known as the journal queue, is a system queue that stores copies of application-generated messages when the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.UseJournalQueue%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 機器筆記本中，也稱為日誌佇列中，為已儲存之系統佇列應用程式所產生的訊息時<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.UseJournalQueue%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: This syntax for the journal is only valid when constructing the format name for the queue.
trans-unit.target: 建構佇列格式名稱時，此語法日誌才有效。

trans-unit.source: The path name syntax is `MachineName`\\`Journal$`.
trans-unit.target: 路徑名稱語法不`MachineName` \\ `Journal$`。

trans-unit.source: -or-
An error occurred when accessing a Message Queuing method.
trans-unit.target: 存取訊息佇列方法時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Creates an enumerator object for all the messages in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 為佇列中的所有訊息建立列舉值物件。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetMessageEnumerator" /> is deprecated.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetMessageEnumerator" /> 已被取代。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetMessageEnumerator2" /> should be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 應改用 <see cref="M:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetMessageEnumerator2" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageEnumerator" /> holding the messages that are contained in the queue.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageEnumerator" />，保有在佇列中所包含的訊息。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetMessageEnumerator%2A> creates a dynamic list of all the messages in a queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetMessageEnumerator%2A> 建立佇列中的所有訊息的動態清單。

trans-unit.source: You can remove from the queue the message at the enumerator's current position by calling <xref:System.Messaging.MessageEnumerator.RemoveCurrent%2A> for the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageEnumerator> that <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetMessageEnumerator%2A> returns.
trans-unit.target: 您可以從佇列中移除位於列舉值的目前位置的訊息藉由呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageEnumerator.RemoveCurrent%2A>如<xref:System.Messaging.MessageEnumerator>，<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetMessageEnumerator%2A>傳回。

trans-unit.source: Because the cursor is associated with the dynamic list of messages in the queue, the enumeration reflects any modification you make to the messages in the queue, if the message is beyond the current cursor position.
trans-unit.target: 因為資料指標相關聯的訊息佇列中的動態清單，列舉型別會反映您對佇列中的訊息進行任何修改，如果訊息超出目前的游標位置。

trans-unit.source: For example, the enumerator can automatically access a lower-priority message placed beyond the cursor's current position, but not a higher-priority message inserted before that position.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，放置游標的目前位置，超出的低優先權訊息但不是插入該位置之前較高優先權的訊息，可以自動存取列舉值。

trans-unit.source: However, you can reset the enumeration, thereby moving the cursor back to the beginning of the list, by calling <xref:System.Messaging.MessageEnumerator.Reset%2A> for the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageEnumerator>.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可以重設列舉型別，藉此將游標移回至清單中，開頭藉由呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageEnumerator.Reset%2A>如<xref:System.Messaging.MessageEnumerator>。

trans-unit.source: The order of the messages in the enumeration reflects their order in the queue, so higher-priority messages will appear before lower-priority ones.
trans-unit.target: 列舉中訊息的順序會反映在佇列中，其順序，所以較高優先權的訊息會出現在優先順序較低的。

trans-unit.source: If you want a static snapshot of the messages in the queue rather than a dynamic connection to them, call <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetAllMessages%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想將它們之訊息佇列，而不是動態的連接靜態快照集時，呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetAllMessages%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an array of <xref:System.Messaging.Message> objects, which represent the messages at the time the method was called.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回的陣列<xref:System.Messaging.Message>代表訊息的時呼叫此方法的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示這個方法中是否有提供各種不同的工作群組模式。

trans-unit.source: Workgroup mode
trans-unit.target: 工作群組模式

trans-unit.source: Available
trans-unit.target: 可用

trans-unit.source: Local computer
trans-unit.target: 本機電腦

trans-unit.source: Yes
Local computer and direct format name
trans-unit.target: 本機電腦，並直接格式名稱

trans-unit.source: Yes
Remote computer
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦

trans-unit.source: Yes
Remote computer and direct format name
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦並直接格式名稱

trans-unit.source: Yes

The following code example gets a dynamic list of messages in a queue and counts all messages with the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Priority%2A> property set to <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePriority.Lowest?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例在佇列取得訊息的動態清單和計數的所有訊息<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Priority%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Messaging.MessagePriority.Lowest?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.target: 您可以從佇列中移除位於列舉值的目前位置的訊息藉由呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageEnumerator.RemoveCurrent%2A>如<xref:System.Messaging.MessageEnumerator>，<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetMessageEnumerator2%2A>傳回。

trans-unit.source: Because the cursor is associated with the dynamic list of messages in the queue, the enumeration reflects any modification you make to the messages in the queue, if the message is beyond the current cursor position.
trans-unit.target: 因為資料指標相關聯的訊息佇列中的動態清單，列舉型別會反映您對佇列中的訊息進行任何修改，如果訊息超出目前的游標位置。

trans-unit.source: For example, the enumerator can automatically access a lower-priority message placed beyond the cursor's current position, but not a higher-priority message inserted before that position.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，放置游標的目前位置，超出的低優先權訊息但不是插入該位置之前較高優先權的訊息，可以自動存取列舉值。

trans-unit.source: However, you can reset the enumeration, thereby moving the cursor back to the beginning of the list, by calling <xref:System.Messaging.MessageEnumerator.Reset%2A> for the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageEnumerator>.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可以重設列舉型別，藉此將游標移回至清單中，開頭藉由呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageEnumerator.Reset%2A>如<xref:System.Messaging.MessageEnumerator>。

trans-unit.source: The order of the messages in the enumeration reflects their order in the queue, so higher-priority messages will appear before lower-priority ones.
trans-unit.target: 列舉中訊息的順序會反映在佇列中，其順序，所以較高優先權的訊息會出現在優先順序較低的。

trans-unit.source: If you want a static snapshot of the messages in the queue rather than a dynamic connection to them, call <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetAllMessages%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想將它們之訊息佇列，而不是動態的連接靜態快照集時，呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetAllMessages%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an array of <xref:System.Messaging.Message> objects, which represent the messages at the time the method was called.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回的陣列<xref:System.Messaging.Message>代表訊息的時呼叫此方法的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示這個方法中是否有提供各種不同的工作群組模式。

trans-unit.source: Workgroup mode
trans-unit.target: 工作群組模式

trans-unit.source: Available
trans-unit.target: 可用

trans-unit.source: Local computer
trans-unit.target: 本機電腦

trans-unit.source: Yes
Local computer and direct format name
trans-unit.target: 本機電腦，並直接格式名稱

trans-unit.source: Yes
Remote computer
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦

trans-unit.source: Yes
Remote computer and direct format name
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦並直接格式名稱

trans-unit.source: Yes
Creates an enumerator object for a dynamic listing of the public queues on the network.
trans-unit.target: 為網路上公用佇列的動態清單建立列舉值物件。

trans-unit.source: Provides forward-only cursor semantics to enumerate through all public queues on the network.
trans-unit.target: 提供順向資料指標語意，以列舉網路上的所有公用佇列。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueEnumerator" /> that provides a dynamic listing of all the public message queues on the network.
trans-unit.target: 提供網路上所有公用訊息佇列動態清單的 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueEnumerator" />。

trans-unit.source: This overload of <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator%2A> returns an enumeration of all the public queues that are on the network.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator%2A>傳回位於網路的所有公用佇列的列舉。

trans-unit.source: Because the cursor is associated with a dynamic listing, the enumeration reflects any modification you make to a queue list for queues deleted or added beyond the cursor's current position.
trans-unit.target: 因為資料指標相關聯的動態清單，列舉型別會反映您對刪除或資料指標的目前位置之後加入佇列的佇列清單所做的任何修改。

trans-unit.source: Additions or deletion of queues located before the cursor's current position are not reflected.
trans-unit.target: 不會反映加入或刪除的資料指標的目前位置前面的佇列。

trans-unit.source: For example, the enumerator can automatically access a queue appended beyond the cursor position but not one inserted before that position.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，佇列，附加到資料指標位置之外，但不是其中插入該位置之前，可以自動存取列舉值。

trans-unit.source: However, you can reset the enumeration, thereby moving the cursor back to the beginning of the list, by calling <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueEnumerator.Reset%2A> for the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueEnumerator>.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可以重設列舉型別，藉此將游標移回至清單中，開頭藉由呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueEnumerator.Reset%2A>如<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueEnumerator>。

trans-unit.source: There is no defined ordering of queues in a network.
trans-unit.target: 沒有佇列的網路中未定義順序。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator does not order them, for example, by computer, label, public or private status, or any other accessible criteria.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值不會排序，例如電腦、 標籤、 公用或私用狀態，或任何其他可存取的準則。

trans-unit.source: If you want a static snapshot of the queues on the network rather than a dynamic connection to them, call <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetPublicQueues%2A> or <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetPrivateQueuesByMachine%28System.String%29>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想在網路，而不是動態的連線，佇列的靜態快照集時，呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetPublicQueues%2A>或<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetPrivateQueuesByMachine%28System.String%29>。

trans-unit.source: Each of these two methods returns an array of <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> objects, which represent the queues at the time the method was called.
trans-unit.target: 這兩種方法的每個傳回的陣列<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>代表佇列的時呼叫此方法的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示這個方法中是否有提供各種不同的工作群組模式。

trans-unit.target: 工作群組模式

trans-unit.target: 本機電腦

trans-unit.target: 本機電腦，並直接格式名稱

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Remote computer
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Remote computer and direct format name
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦並直接格式名稱

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: The following code example iterates through all the message queues in the network, and examines the path for each queue.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會逐一查看網路中的所有訊息佇列，並檢查每個佇列的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Finally, it displays the number of public queues on the network.
trans-unit.target: 最後，它會在網路上顯示公用佇列的數目。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueCriteria" /> that contains the criteria used to filter the available message queues.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueCriteria" />，包含用來篩選可用訊息佇列的準則。

trans-unit.source: Provides forward-only cursor semantics to enumerate through all public queues on the network that meet the specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: 提供順向資料指標語意，以列舉網路上所有符合指定準則的公用佇列。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueEnumerator" /> that provides a dynamic listing of the public message queues on the network that satisfy the restrictions specified by the <paramref name="criteria" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 提供網路上所有公用訊息佇列動態清單的 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueEnumerator" />，其符合 <paramref name="criteria" /> 參數指定的限制。

trans-unit.source: This overload of <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator%2A> returns a listing of all the public queues on the network that satisfy criteria defined in the application criteria.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator%2A>傳回符合準則的應用程式準則中所定義的網路上的所有公用佇列的清單。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the criteria to include, for example, queue creation or modification time, computer name, label, category, or any combination of these.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定建立或修改時間、 電腦名稱、 標籤、 類別目錄或上述任何組合，例如，排入佇列要包括的準則。

trans-unit.source: Because the cursor is associated with a dynamic listing, the enumeration reflects any modification you make to a queue that occurs beyond the cursor's current position.
trans-unit.target: 因為資料指標相關聯的動態清單，列舉型別會反映您對資料指標的目前位置之後，就會發生的佇列進行任何修改。

trans-unit.source: Changes to queues located before the cursor's current position are not reflected.
trans-unit.target: 不會反映佇列資料指標的目前位置前面的變更。

trans-unit.source: For example, the enumerator can automatically access a queue appended beyond the cursor position but not one inserted before that position.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，佇列，附加到資料指標位置之外，但不是其中插入該位置之前，可以自動存取列舉值。

trans-unit.source: However, you can reset the enumeration, thereby moving the cursor back to the beginning of the list, by calling <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueEnumerator.Reset%2A> for the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueEnumerator>.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可以重設列舉型別，藉此將游標移回至清單中，開頭藉由呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueEnumerator.Reset%2A>如<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueEnumerator>。

trans-unit.source: There is no defined ordering of queues in a network.
trans-unit.target: 沒有佇列的網路中未定義順序。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator does not order them, for example, by computer, label, public or private status, or any other accessible criteria.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值不會排序，例如電腦、 標籤、 公用或私用狀態，或任何其他可存取的準則。

trans-unit.source: If you want a static snapshot of the queues on the network rather than a dynamic connection to them, specify criteria for <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetPublicQueues%2A> or call <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetPrivateQueuesByMachine%28System.String%29>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想在網路，而不是動態的連線，佇列的靜態快照集時，指定的準則<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetPublicQueues%2A>或呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetPrivateQueuesByMachine%28System.String%29>。

trans-unit.source: Each of these two methods returns an array of <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> objects, which represent the queues at the time the method was called.
trans-unit.target: 這兩種方法的每個傳回的陣列<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>代表佇列的時呼叫此方法的物件。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetPublicQueuesByCategory%28System.Guid%29>, <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetPublicQueuesByLabel%28System.String%29>, or <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetPublicQueuesByMachine%28System.String%29> provides the same results as calling <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetPublicQueues%2A> with the filtering criteria of <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Category%2A>, <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Label%2A>, and <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MachineName%2A>, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetPublicQueuesByCategory%28System.Guid%29>， <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetPublicQueuesByLabel%28System.String%29>，或<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetPublicQueuesByMachine%28System.String%29>提供相同的結果，與呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetPublicQueues%2A>的篩選條件與<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Category%2A>， <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Label%2A>，和<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MachineName%2A>分別。

trans-unit.source: The computer from which to retrieve the private queues.
trans-unit.target: 要從其中擷取私用佇列的電腦。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves all the private queues on the specified computer.
trans-unit.target: 擷取所指定電腦上的所有私用佇列。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> 物件的陣列，會參考擷取的私用佇列。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetPrivateQueuesByMachine%28System.String%29> 擷取指定的電腦上之佇列的靜態快照集。

The following code example retrieves lists of queues.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會擷取佇列的清單。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="machineName" /> parameter is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="machineName" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" /> 或空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a Message Queuing method.
trans-unit.target: 存取訊息佇列方法時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves all the public queues on the network.
trans-unit.target: 擷取網路上所有的公用佇列。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves all the public queues on the network.
trans-unit.target: 擷取網路上所有的公用佇列。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> objects that reference the retrieved public queues.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> 物件的陣列，會參考擷取的公用佇列。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload if you want a complete list of all the public queues on the network.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想在網路上的所有公用佇列的完整清單，請使用此多載。

trans-unit.source: If you want to restrict the list by certain criteria, such as <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MachineName%2A>, <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Category%2A>, or last modified time use another overload of this method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要限制特定準則，例如<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MachineName%2A>， <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Category%2A>，或上次修改的時間使用這個方法的另一個多載。

trans-unit.source: (Alternatively, you can use <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetPublicQueuesByMachine%28System.String%29>, <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetPublicQueuesByCategory%28System.Guid%29>, or <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetPublicQueuesByLabel%28System.String%29>.)
trans-unit.target: (或者，您可以使用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetPublicQueuesByMachine%28System.String%29>， <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetPublicQueuesByCategory%28System.Guid%29>，或<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetPublicQueuesByLabel%28System.String%29>。)

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetPublicQueues%2A> retrieves a static snapshot of the queues.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetPublicQueues%2A> 擷取佇列的靜態快照集。

trans-unit.source: To interact with a dynamic list of the queues, use <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要互動之佇列的動態清單，請使用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator%2A>。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueCriteria" /> that contains the criteria used to filter the queues.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueCriteria" />，包含用來篩選佇列的準則。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves all the public queues on the network that meet the specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: 擷取網路上符合指定準則的所有公用佇列。

trans-unit.source: If you want to filter all the public queues on the network by label, category, or computer name, the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> class contains specific methods that provide that functionality (<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetPublicQueuesByLabel%28System.String%29>, <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetPublicQueuesByCategory%28System.Guid%29>, and <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetPublicQueuesByMachine%28System.String%29>, respectively).
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要依標籤、 類別或電腦名稱，篩選網路上的所有公用佇列<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>類別包含可提供該功能的特定方法 (<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetPublicQueuesByLabel%28System.String%29>， <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetPublicQueuesByCategory%28System.Guid%29>，和<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetPublicQueuesByMachine%28System.String%29>分別)。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to get a list of all the public queues on the network that meet more than one of these criteria (for example, if you want to specify both a label and a category).
trans-unit.target: 使用此多載以取得所有公用佇列的網路上 （例如，如果您想要指定標籤和分類） 符合一個以上的這些準則的清單。

trans-unit.source: You can also filter by message criteria other than <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Label%2A>, <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Category%2A>, and <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MachineName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以根據篩選準則訊息以外<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Label%2A>， <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Category%2A>，和<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MachineName%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For example, you use this overload to filter by a queue's last-modified time.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用這個多載以篩選出的佇列的上次修改時間。

trans-unit.source: Simply create a new instance of the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueCriteria> class, set the appropriate properties in the instance, and pass the instance as the `criteria` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 只要建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueCriteria>類別、 執行個體中，設定適當的屬性，並傳遞做為執行個體`criteria`參數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetPublicQueues%2A> retrieves a static snapshot of the queues.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetPublicQueues%2A> 擷取佇列的靜態快照集。

trans-unit.source: To interact with a dynamic list of the queues, use <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要互動之佇列的動態清單，請使用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves all the public queues on the network that belong to the specified category.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to filter the public queues by category.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法依類別篩選公用佇列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Category%2A> property provides access to the Message Queuing type ID property (which is read/write) of a particular queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Category%2A>屬性提供的訊息佇列類型 ID 屬性 （這是讀取/寫入） 的特定佇列的存取。

trans-unit.source: Although you can use <xref:System.Guid.NewGuid%2A> to create a category value that is unique across all <xref:System.Guid> values, it is not necessary.
trans-unit.target: 雖然您可以使用<xref:System.Guid.NewGuid%2A>來建立類別目錄的值，而且是唯一的所有<xref:System.Guid>值，都則不需要。

trans-unit.source: The category value needs to be distinct only from other categories, not from all other <xref:System.Guid> values.
trans-unit.target: 類別目錄值必須是相異只能從其他類別，不是從所有其他<xref:System.Guid>值。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can assign {00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001} as the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Category%2A> for one set of queues and {00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000002} as the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Category%2A> for another set.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指派{00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001}做為<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Category%2A>佇列的一組和{00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000002}為<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Category%2A>另一個集。
