trans-unit.source: Specifies that no size restriction exists for a queue.
trans-unit.target: 指定佇列沒有大小限制。

trans-unit.source: This member is frequently used when setting <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MaximumJournalSize%2A> or <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MaximumQueueSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 設定時，經常會使用這個成員<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MaximumJournalSize%2A>或<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MaximumQueueSize%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.InfiniteQueueSize> member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.InfiniteQueueSize>成員。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that no time-out exists for methods that peek or receive messages.
trans-unit.target: 指定窺視 (Peek) 或接收訊息的方法沒有逾時限制。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> supports two types of message retrieval: synchronous and asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> 支援兩種擷取訊息類型： 同步和非同步。

trans-unit.source: The synchronous methods, <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A> and <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A>, cause the process thread to wait a specified time interval for a new message to arrive in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 同步方法，<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A>和<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A>，導致處理序執行緒等待新訊息到達佇列中的指定的時間間隔。

trans-unit.source: If the specified time interval is <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.InfiniteTimeout>, the process thread remains blocked until a new message is available.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的時間間隔為<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.InfiniteTimeout>，處理序執行緒會保持封鎖，直到新訊息。

trans-unit.source: On the other hand, <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginPeek%2A> and <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A> (the asynchronous methods), allow the main application tasks to continue in a separate thread until a message arrives in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginPeek%2A>和<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A>（非同步方法），允許不同的執行緒中繼續，直到訊息抵達佇列中的主應用程式工作。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.InfiniteTimeout> member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.InfiniteTimeout>成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the queue description.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定佇列描述。

trans-unit.source: The label for the message queue.
trans-unit.target: 訊息佇列的標記。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The maximum length of a message queue label is 124 characters.
trans-unit.target: 訊息佇列標籤的最大長度為 124 個字元。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Label%2A> property does not need to be unique across all queues.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Label%2A>屬性不需要是唯一的所有佇列。

trans-unit.source: However, if multiple queues share the same <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Label%2A>, you cannot use the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%28System.Object%29> method to broadcast a message to all of them.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果多個佇列都共用相同<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Label%2A>，您不能使用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%28System.Object%29>廣播到所有的這些訊息的方法。

trans-unit.source: If you use the label syntax for the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A> property when you send the message, an exception will be thrown if the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Label%2A> is not unique.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的標籤語法<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A>屬性傳送訊息時，發生例外狀況會擲回<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Label%2A>不是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that indicates when the queue properties were last modified.

trans-unit.source: The last modification time includes when the queue was created and any <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> property that modifies the Message Queuing queue, such as <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BasePriority%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 建立佇列時，包含上次修改時間和任何<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>屬性，例如修改 「 訊息佇列 」 佇列， <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BasePriority%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.LastModifyTime%2A> property represents the system time of the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.LastModifyTime%2A>屬性代表本機電腦的系統時間。

trans-unit.source: You must call <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Refresh%2A> before getting the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.LastModifyTime%2A> property; otherwise, the modification time associated with this <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> might not be current.
trans-unit.target: 您必須呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Refresh%2A>再取得<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.LastModifyTime%2A>屬性; 否則修改相關聯的時間與這個<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>可能不是最新資訊。

trans-unit.target: 例如，只有電腦名稱辨識這個屬性， `Server0`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MachineName%2A> property does not support the IP address format.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MachineName%2A>屬性不支援 IP 位址的格式。

trans-unit.source: If you define the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A> in terms of the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MachineName%2A>, the application throws an exception when working offline because the domain controller is required for path translation.
trans-unit.target: 如果您定義<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A>的<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MachineName%2A>，應用程式在離線工作，因為網域控制站是所需路徑轉譯時，會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must use the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.FormatName%2A> for the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A> syntax when working offline.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您必須使用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.FormatName%2A>如<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A>離線工作時的語法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MachineName%2A>, <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A>, and <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.QueueName%2A> properties are related.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MachineName%2A>， <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A>，和<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.QueueName%2A>相關屬性。

trans-unit.source: Changing the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MachineName%2A> property causes the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A> property to change.
trans-unit.target: 變更<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MachineName%2A>屬性原因<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A>来變更屬性。

trans-unit.source: It is built from the new <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MachineName%2A> and the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.QueueName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 建置在新<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MachineName%2A>和<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.QueueName%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Changing the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A> (for example, to use the format name syntax) resets the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MachineName%2A> and <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.QueueName%2A> properties to refer to the new queue.
trans-unit.target: 變更<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A>（例如，若要使用的格式名稱語法） 會重設<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MachineName%2A>和<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.QueueName%2A>屬性來參考新的佇列。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.QueueName%2A> property is empty, the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A> is set to the Journal queue of the computer you specify.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.QueueName%2A>屬性是空的<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A>設為您指定之電腦的日誌佇列。

trans-unit.source: The following code example gets and sets the value of a message queue's <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MachineName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會取得並設定訊息佇列的值<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MachineName%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the computer is not valid, possibly because the syntax is incorrect.
trans-unit.target: 電腦的名稱無效，可能是因為語法不正確。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a Message Queuing method.
trans-unit.target: 存取訊息佇列方法時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum size of the journal queue.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定日誌佇列的最大大小。

trans-unit.source: The maximum size, in kilobytes, of the journal queue.
trans-unit.target: 日誌佇列大小的最大值 (以 KB 為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The Message Queuing default specifies that no limit exists.
trans-unit.target: 訊息佇列預設不指定上限。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MaximumJournalSize%2A> provides access to the Message Queuing journal storage limit.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MaximumJournalSize%2A> 提供存取訊息佇列的日誌存放區限制。

trans-unit.source: It is relevant only when <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.UseJournalQueue%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 它是相關時，才<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.UseJournalQueue%2A>是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property modifies the Message Queuing queue.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性可以修改 「 訊息佇列 」 佇列。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, any other <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> instances are affected by the change
trans-unit.target: 因此，任何其他<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>變更會影響執行個體

trans-unit.source: If you store messages in a journal or dead-letter queue, you should periodically clear the queue to remove messages that are no longer needed.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將訊息儲存在日誌或寄不出的信件佇列，您應該定期清除佇列，以便移除不再需要的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Messages in such a queue count toward the message quota for the computer where the queue resides.
trans-unit.target: 這類佇列中的訊息都會計佇列所在的電腦的訊息配額。

trans-unit.source: (The administrator sets the computer quota.)
trans-unit.target: （系統管理員設定電腦配額）。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示此屬性是否可以使用各種不同的工作群組模式中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example gets and sets the value of a message queue's <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MaximumJournalSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會取得並設定訊息佇列的值<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MaximumJournalSize%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The maximum journal queue size was set to an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: 日誌佇列的最大值設定為無效值。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a Message Queuing method.
trans-unit.target: 存取訊息佇列方法時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum size of the queue.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定佇列的最大值。

trans-unit.source: The maximum size, in kilobytes, of the queue.
trans-unit.target: 佇列的最大值 (以 KB 計)。

trans-unit.source: The Message Queuing default specifies that no limit exists.
trans-unit.target: 訊息佇列預設不指定上限。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MaximumQueueSize%2A> provides access to the Message Queuing message storage limit, which is separate from the computer's message quota that the administrator defines.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MaximumQueueSize%2A>存取訊息佇列訊息存放區限制，從電腦的系統管理員定義的訊息配額分開的。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the message quota, see <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MaximumJournalSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需訊息配額的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MaximumJournalSize%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property modifies the Message Queuing queue.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性可以修改 「 訊息佇列 」 佇列。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, any other <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> instances are affected by the change
trans-unit.target: 因此，任何其他<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>變更會影響執行個體

trans-unit.source: If an attempt is made to exceed either the maximum queue size or the computer message quota, messages might be lost.
trans-unit.target: 如果嘗試超過佇列大小上限或電腦訊息配額時，訊息可能會遺失。

trans-unit.source: When the queue quota is reached, Message Queuing notifies the administration queue of the sending application to indicate that the queue is full, by returning a negative acknowledgment message.
trans-unit.target: 當到達佇列配額時，訊息佇列通知，表示傳回負值通知訊息的佇列已滿，傳送應用程式的管理佇列。

trans-unit.source: Message Queuing continues to send negative acknowledgments until the total size of the messages in the queue drops below the limit.
trans-unit.target: 訊息佇列會繼續傳送負值通知，直到佇列中的訊息總大小低於限制。

trans-unit.target: 下表顯示此屬性是否可以使用各種不同的工作群組模式中。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a Message Queuing method.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the property filter for receiving or peeking messages.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定接收或窺視訊息的屬性篩選條件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter" /> used by the queue to filter the set of properties it receives or peeks for each message.
trans-unit.target: 佇列用來為每個訊息篩選它所接收或窺視的屬性集的 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter" />。

trans-unit.source: This filter is a set of Boolean values restricting the message properties that the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> receives or peeks.
trans-unit.target: 此篩選器是一組限制的訊息屬性的布林值，<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>接收或窺視。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> receives or peeks a message from the server queue, it retrieves only those properties for which the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MessageReadPropertyFilter%2A> value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>接收或窺視訊息從伺服器佇列中，它會擷取只有這些屬性的<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MessageReadPropertyFilter%2A>值是`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following shows initial property values for the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MessageReadPropertyFilter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示的初始屬性值的<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MessageReadPropertyFilter%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: These settings are identical to calling <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.SetDefaults%2A> on a <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter>.
trans-unit.target: 這些設定是相同於呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.SetDefaults%2A>上<xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter>。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Default value
trans-unit.target: 預設值

trans-unit.source: 1024 bytes
trans-unit.target: 1024 個位元組

trans-unit.source: 255 bytes
trans-unit.target: 255 個位元組

trans-unit.source: 255 bytes
trans-unit.target: 255 個位元組

The following code example uses the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MessageReadPropertyFilter%2A> to restrict the message properties received.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MessageReadPropertyFilter%2A>限制接收的訊息內容。

trans-unit.source: The filter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 篩選條件為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Introduced in MSMQ 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 在 MSMQ 3.0 中介紹。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the multicast address associated with the queue.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與佇列相關聯的多點傳送位址。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains a valid multicast address (in the form shown below) or <see langword="null" />, which indicates that the queue is not associated with a multicast address.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含有效的多點傳送位址 (在下面所示的表單中)，否則為 <see langword="null" />，表示佇列未與多點傳送位址相關聯。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MulticastAddress%2A> property is used to associate a non-transactional queue with a multicast address that can be used when sending messages.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MulticastAddress%2A>屬性用來將非交易式佇列與傳送訊息時可以使用多點傳送位址產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: You cannot associate a transactional queue with a multicast address.
trans-unit.target: 您無法將交易式佇列與多點傳送位址。

trans-unit.source: When the sending application sends messages to a multicast address, Message Queuing sends a copy of the message to every queue associated with that address.
trans-unit.target: 當傳送應用程式會將訊息傳送至多點傳送位址時，訊息佇列傳送至該位址相關聯的每個佇列的訊息的複本。

trans-unit.source: IP multicast addresses must be in the class D range from 224.0.0.0 to 239.255.255.255, which corresponds to setting the first four high-order bits equal to 1110.
trans-unit.target: IP 多點傳送位址必須在類別 D 範圍從 224.0.0.0 到 239.255.255.255，對應到前四個高序位位元等於 1110年的設定。

trans-unit.source: However, only certain ranges of addresses in this range are unreserved and available for sending multicast messages.
trans-unit.target: 不過，只有某些特定範圍的位址範圍中都未保留，可用於傳送多點傳送的訊息。

trans-unit.source: For the latest list of reserved multicast addresses, see the [Internet Assigned Number Authority (IANA) Internet Multicast Addresses](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=3859) Web page.
trans-unit.target: 如需保留的多點傳送位址的最新清單，請參閱[網際網路指定編號 Authority (IANA) 網際網路多點傳送位址](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=3859)網頁。

trans-unit.source: There are no restrictions on the port number.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何通訊埠編號上的限制。

trans-unit.source: If several source computers are sending multicast messages and you want a specific queue to receive messages from only one source computer, each source computer must send messages to a different combination of IP address and port number.
trans-unit.target: 如果數個來源電腦傳送多點傳送的訊息，而且您想要特定的佇列接收訊息從一個來源電腦，每台來源電腦必須將訊息傳送至不同的 IP 位址和連接埠號碼組合。

trans-unit.source: To dissociate a queue from a multicast address, set the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MulticastAddress%2A> property to a zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: 若要中斷關聯的佇列，從多點傳送位址，設定<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MulticastAddress%2A>屬性設為零長度字串。

trans-unit.source: Do not set it to `null`, as this will result in a <xref:System.ArgumentNullException>.
trans-unit.target: 請勿將它設為`null`，因為這會導致<xref:System.ArgumentNullException>。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <see cref="P:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path" /> causes the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> to point to a new queue.
trans-unit.target: 設定 <see cref="P:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path" /> 會使 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> 指向新佇列。

trans-unit.source: The queue that is referenced by the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> 參考的佇列。

trans-unit.source: The default depends on which <see cref="M:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.#ctor" /> constructor you use; it is either <see langword="null" /> or is specified by the constructor's <paramref name="path" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 預設值取決於您使用的 <see cref="M:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.#ctor" /> 建構函式，可以是 <see langword="null" />，或者是由建構函式的 <paramref name="path" /> 參數指定。

trans-unit.source: The syntax for the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A> property depends on the type of queue it points to, as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 語法<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A>屬性取決於佇列類型它點至下, 表所示。

trans-unit.source: Queue type
trans-unit.target: 佇列類型

trans-unit.source: Syntax
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.target: 公用佇列

trans-unit.target: 私用佇列

trans-unit.target: 日誌佇列

trans-unit.target: 電腦日誌佇列

trans-unit.source: Machine dead-letter queue
trans-unit.target: 機器寄不出信件佇列

trans-unit.source: Use "." to represent the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 使用"。"代表本機電腦。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MachineName%2A>, <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A>, and <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.QueueName%2A> properties are related.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MachineName%2A>， <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A>，和<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.QueueName%2A>相關屬性。

trans-unit.source: Changing the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MachineName%2A> property causes the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A> property to change.
trans-unit.target: 變更<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MachineName%2A>屬性原因<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A>来變更屬性。

trans-unit.source: It is built from the new <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MachineName%2A> and the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.QueueName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 建置在新<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MachineName%2A>和<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.QueueName%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Changing the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A> (for example, to use the format name syntax) resets the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MachineName%2A> and <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.QueueName%2A> properties to refer to the new queue.
trans-unit.target: 變更<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A>（例如，若要使用的格式名稱語法） 會重設<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MachineName%2A>和<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.QueueName%2A>屬性來參考新的佇列。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.FormatName%2A> or <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Label%2A> to describe the queue path, as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以使用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.FormatName%2A>或<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Label%2A>來描述為佇列路徑下, 表所示。

trans-unit.source: Reference
trans-unit.target: 參考資料

trans-unit.source: Syntax
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: Format name
trans-unit.target: 格式名稱

trans-unit.source: `FormatName:` [ *format name* ]
trans-unit.target: `FormatName:` [*格式名稱*]

trans-unit.source: `FormatName:Public=` 5A5F7535-AE9A-41d4-935C-845C2AFF7112
trans-unit.target: `FormatName:Public=` 5A5F7535-AE9A-41d4-935C-845C2AFF7112

trans-unit.source: Label
trans-unit.target: ThisAddIn

trans-unit.source: `Label:` [ *label* ]
trans-unit.target: `Label:` [*標籤*]

trans-unit.source: `Label:` TheLabel
trans-unit.target: `Label:` TheLabel

trans-unit.source: If you use the label syntax for the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A> property when you send the message, an exception will be thrown if the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Label%2A> is not unique.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的標籤語法<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A>屬性傳送訊息時，發生例外狀況會擲回<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Label%2A>不是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: To work offline, you must use the format name syntax, rather than the friendly name syntax in the first table.
trans-unit.target: 若要設為離線工作，您必須使用第一個資料表中的格式名稱語法，而不是易記名稱語法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, an exception is thrown because the primary domain controller (on which Active Directory resides) is not available to resolve the path to the format name.
trans-unit.target: 否則，因為網域主控站 （Active Directory 所在） 不是可解析成格式名稱的路徑，便會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Setting a new path closes the message queue and releases all handles.
trans-unit.target: 設定新的路徑時，關閉訊息佇列，並釋放所有控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示此屬性是否可以使用各種不同的工作群組模式中。

trans-unit.source: Workgroup mode
trans-unit.target: 工作群組模式

trans-unit.source: Available
trans-unit.target: 可用

trans-unit.source: Local computer
trans-unit.target: 本機電腦

trans-unit.source: Yes
Local computer and direct format name
trans-unit.target: 本機電腦，並直接格式名稱

trans-unit.source: Yes
Remote computer
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦

trans-unit.source: Yes
Remote computer and direct format name
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦並直接格式名稱

trans-unit.source: Yes
In workgroup mode you can only use private queues.
trans-unit.target: 工作群組模式中，您可以只使用私用佇列。

trans-unit.source: You specify the path using the private queue syntax `MachineName`\\`Private$`\\`QueueName`.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的路徑，使用私用佇列語法`MachineName` \\ `Private$` \\ `QueueName`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates new <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> objects using various path name syntax types.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例建立新<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>物件，使用不同的路徑名稱語法類型。

trans-unit.source: In each case, it sends a message to the queue whose path is defined in the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 在每個案例中，它會傳送訊息至佇列的路徑在建構函式中定義。

trans-unit.source: The path is not valid, possibly because the syntax is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 路徑無效，可能是因為語法無效。

trans-unit.source: The method is not thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不是安全執行緒。

trans-unit.source: Returns a copy of the first message in the queue without removing the message from the queue.
trans-unit.target: 傳回佇列中第一個訊息的複本，但不從佇列中移除訊息。

trans-unit.source: Returns without removing (peeks) the first message in the queue referenced by this <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回而不移除 (窺視) 這個 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> 所參考佇列中的第一個訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek" /> method is synchronous, so it blocks the current thread until a message becomes available.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek" /> 方法是同步的，因此會封鎖目前的執行緒，直到訊息可以使用為止。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> that represents the first message in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 表示佇列中第一個訊息的 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to peek a queue, or to wait until a message exists in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 若要查看佇列中，或等候直到有訊息佇列中，請使用此多載。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A> method reads, but does not remove, the first message from the queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A>方法讀取，但不會移除，從佇列的第一個訊息。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, repeated calls to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A> return the same message, unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 因此，重複呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A>傳回相同的訊息，除非較高優先權的訊息抵達佇列中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A> method, on the other hand, both reads and removes the first message from the queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A>方法，相反地，同時讀取，並從佇列中移除第一個訊息。

trans-unit.source: Repeated calls to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A>, therefore, return different messages.
trans-unit.target: 重複呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A>，因此，會傳回不同的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Message Queuing orders messages in the queue according to priority and arrival time.
trans-unit.target: 訊息佇列會根據優先權和抵達時間在佇列中排序訊息。

trans-unit.source: A newer message is placed before an older one only if it is of a higher priority.
trans-unit.target: 只有在優先順序較高的舊之前放置較新的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A> when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it waits for a message to arrive in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 當目前的執行緒可接受進行封鎖並同時等候訊息到達佇列時，請使用 <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Because this overload does not specify a time-out, the application might wait indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載不會指定逾時，應用程式可能會無限期等候。

trans-unit.source: If you need the application processing to continue without waiting, use the asynchronous <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginPeek%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 當您需要應用程式繼續執行而不要等候，請使用非同步的 <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginPeek%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can specify a time-out for a message to arrive in the queue by using the overload of <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A> that specifies a time-out.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以指定的逾時訊息到達佇列中所使用的多載<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A>所指定的逾時。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示這個方法中是否有提供各種不同的工作群組模式。

trans-unit.target: 工作群組模式

trans-unit.target: 可用

trans-unit.target: 本機電腦

trans-unit.target: 本機電腦，並直接格式名稱

trans-unit.source: Yes
Remote computer
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦

trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Remote computer and direct format name
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦並直接格式名稱

trans-unit.source: Yes
The following examples use the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A> method on a queue.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A>佇列上的方法。

trans-unit.source: In the first example, the application waits until a message becomes available in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 在第一個範例中，應用程式會等到訊息成為佇列中可用。

trans-unit.source: Note that the first example does not access the message that arrives; it merely pauses processing until a message arrives.
trans-unit.target: 請注意第一個範例不會存取訊息到達。它只會暫停處理，直到訊息抵達。

trans-unit.source: If a message already exists in the queue, it will return immediately.
trans-unit.target: 如果佇列中已有一則訊息，它會立即傳回。

trans-unit.source: In the second example, a message that contains an application-defined `Order` class is sent to the queue, and then peeked from the queue.
trans-unit.target: 在第二個範例中，包含應用程式定義的訊息`Order`類別傳送至佇列，並接著會從佇列查看。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a Message Queuing method.
trans-unit.target: 存取訊息佇列方法時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The method is not thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不是安全執行緒。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that indicates the maximum time to wait for the queue to contain a message.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />，指出等待含有訊息之佇列的最長時間。

trans-unit.source: Returns without removing (peeks) the first message in the queue referenced by this <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回而不移除 (窺視) 這個 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> 所參考佇列中的第一個訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek" /> method is synchronous, so it blocks the current thread until a message becomes available or the specified time-out occurs.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek" /> 方法是同步的，因此會封鎖目前的執行緒，直到訊息可以使用或發生指定的逾時為止。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> that represents the first message in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 表示佇列中第一個訊息的 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to peek a queue, or to wait a specified period of time until a message exists in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 若要查看佇列中，或等候一段指定的時間，直到有訊息佇列中，請使用此多載。

trans-unit.source: The method returns immediately if a message already exists in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 如果佇列中已有一則訊息的方法會立即傳回。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A> method reads, but does not remove, the first message from the queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A>方法讀取，但不會移除，從佇列的第一個訊息。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, repeated calls to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A> return the same message, unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 因此，重複呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A>傳回相同的訊息，除非較高優先權的訊息抵達佇列中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A> method, on the other hand, both reads and removes the first message from the queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A>方法，相反地，同時讀取，並從佇列中移除第一個訊息。

trans-unit.source: Repeated calls to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A>, therefore, return different messages.
trans-unit.target: 重複呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A>，因此，會傳回不同的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Message Queuing orders messages in the queue according to priority and arrival time.
trans-unit.target: 訊息佇列會根據優先權和抵達時間在佇列中排序訊息。

trans-unit.source: A newer message is placed before an older one only if it is of a higher priority.
trans-unit.target: 只有在優先順序較高的舊之前放置較新的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A> when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it waits for a message to arrive in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 當目前的執行緒可接受進行封鎖並同時等候訊息到達佇列時，請使用 <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The thread will be blocked up to the specified period of time, or indefinitely if you indicated <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.InfiniteTimeout>.
trans-unit.target: 執行緒會封鎖到指定的期間內的時間或無限期如果指出<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.InfiniteTimeout>。

trans-unit.source: If you need the application processing to continue without waiting, use the asynchronous <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginPeek%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 當您需要應用程式繼續執行而不要等候，請使用非同步的 <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginPeek%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that indicates the maximum time to wait for the queue to contain a message.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />，指出等待含有訊息之佇列的最長時間。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Cursor" /> that maintains a specific position in the message queue.

trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.PeekAction" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether to peek at the current message in the queue, or the next message.
trans-unit.target: 指出要窺視佇列中的目前訊息，還是下一則訊息。

trans-unit.source: Returns without removing (peeks) the current or next message in the queue, using the specified cursor.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的游標傳回而不移除 (窺視) 佇列中的目前或下一則訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek" /> method is synchronous, so it blocks the current thread until a message becomes available or the specified time-out occurs.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek" /> 方法是同步的，因此會封鎖目前的執行緒，直到訊息可以使用或發生指定的逾時為止。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> that represents a message in the queue.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" />，表示佇列中的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to peek a queue, or to wait a specified period of time until a message exists in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 若要查看佇列中，或等候一段指定的時間，直到有訊息佇列中，請使用此多載。

trans-unit.source: The method returns immediately if a message already exists in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 如果佇列中已有一則訊息的方法會立即傳回。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A> method reads, but does not remove, a message from the queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A>方法讀取，但不會移除，將訊息從佇列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A> method, on the other hand, both reads and removes a message from the queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A>方法，相反地，同時讀取，並從佇列移除訊息。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A> when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it waits for a message to arrive in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 當目前的執行緒可接受進行封鎖並同時等候訊息到達佇列時，請使用 <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The thread is blocked up to the specified period of time, or indefinitely if you indicated <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.InfiniteTimeout>.
trans-unit.target: 最多指定的期間內的時間或無限期地封鎖執行緒如果指出<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.InfiniteTimeout>。

trans-unit.source: Peeks a message that matches a given correlation identifier.
trans-unit.target: 窺視符合指定關聯識別項的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.CorrelationId" /> of the message to peek.
trans-unit.target: 要窺視訊息的 <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.CorrelationId" />。

trans-unit.source: Peeks the message that matches the given correlation identifier and immediately raises an exception if no message with the specified correlation identifier currently exists in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 窺視符合指定關聯識別項的訊息，而且在佇列中目前沒有指定關聯識別項的訊息時，立即引發例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> whose <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.CorrelationId" /> matches the <paramref name="correlationId" /> parameter passed in.
trans-unit.target: 傳入符合 <paramref name="correlationId" /> 參數的 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.CorrelationId" />。

trans-unit.source: This method looks in the queue referenced by the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> for a message whose <xref:System.Messaging.Message.CorrelationId%2A> matches the specified `correlationId` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會在所參照的佇列<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>訊息其<xref:System.Messaging.Message.CorrelationId%2A>符合指定`correlationId`參數。

trans-unit.source: If no message is found that matches the `correlationID` parameter, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果不找到任何訊息符合`correlationID`參數時，擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.CorrelationId%2A> property is used to tie a message sent to the queue to associated response, report, or acknowledgment messages.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.CorrelationId%2A>屬性用來將繫結傳送至相關聯的回應、 報表或通知訊息至佇列的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Two other methods allow you to peek messages in a queue.
trans-unit.target: 另外兩個方法可讓您查看佇列中的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A> method returns the first message in the queue, and the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekById%28System.String%29> method is used to retrieve a message by specifying its unique identifier.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A>方法會傳回第一個訊息在佇列中，而<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekById%28System.String%29>方法用來擷取訊息，藉由指定其唯一識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示這個方法中是否有提供各種不同的工作群組模式。

trans-unit.source: Workgroup mode
trans-unit.target: 工作群組模式

trans-unit.source: Available
trans-unit.target: 可用

trans-unit.source: Local computer
trans-unit.target: 本機電腦

trans-unit.source: Yes
Local computer and direct format name
trans-unit.target: 本機電腦，並直接格式名稱

trans-unit.source: Yes
Remote computer
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Remote computer and direct format name
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦並直接格式名稱

trans-unit.source: Yes
The following code example sends and receives a message that contains an order to and from a queue.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將傳送和接收包含訂單與佇列的訊息。

trans-unit.source: It specifically requests a positive acknowledgment when the original message reaches or is retrieved from the queue.
trans-unit.target: 它特別要求正值通知，當原始訊息抵達或已從佇列擷取。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="correlationId" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="correlationId" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The message with the specified <paramref name="correlationId" /> could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到具有指定 <paramref name="correlationId" /> 的訊息。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a Message Queuing method.
trans-unit.target: 存取訊息佇列方法時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.CorrelationId" /> of the message to peek.
trans-unit.target: 要窺視訊息的 <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.CorrelationId" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that indicates the time to wait until a new message is available for inspection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />，指出等待新訊息可以進行檢查的時間。

trans-unit.source: Peeks the message that matches the given correlation identifier and waits until either a message with the specified correlation identifier is available in the queue, or the time-out expires.
trans-unit.target: 窺視符合指定的關聯識別項的訊息，並且等候佇列中出現具有指定關聯識別項的訊息，或者等候直到逾時到期。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> whose <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.CorrelationId" /> matches the <paramref name="correlationId" /> parameter passed in.
trans-unit.target: 傳入符合 <paramref name="correlationId" /> 參數的 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.CorrelationId" />。

trans-unit.source: This method looks in the queue referenced by the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> for a message whose <xref:System.Messaging.Message.CorrelationId%2A> matches the specified `correlationId` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會在所參照的佇列<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>訊息其<xref:System.Messaging.Message.CorrelationId%2A>符合指定`correlationId`參數。

trans-unit.source: If no message is found that matches the `correlationID` parameter, and no new message arrives in the queue within the period specified by the `timeout` parameter, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果不找到任何訊息符合`correlationID`參數，以及任何新訊息到達佇列中所指定的期間內`timeout`參數時，擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The `timeout` parameter does not specify the total running time for this method.
trans-unit.target: `timeout`參數未指定此方法的執行時間總計。

trans-unit.source: Rather, it specifies the time to wait for a new message to arrive in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，它會指定新訊息到達佇列中等候的時間。

trans-unit.source: Each time a new message arrives, this method examines the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.CorrelationId%2A> of the new message to see if it matches the `correlationId` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 每次新的訊息抵達時，這個方法會檢查<xref:System.Messaging.Message.CorrelationId%2A>新訊息是否符合`correlationId`參數。

trans-unit.source: If not, this method starts the time-out period over and waits for another new message to arrive.
trans-unit.target: 否則，這個方法的逾時期間的開始，並等候另一個新訊息到達。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if new messages continue to arrive within the time-out period, it is possible for this method to continue running indefinitely, either until the time-out period expires without any new messages arriving, or until a message arrives whose <xref:System.Messaging.Message.CorrelationId%2A> matches the `correlationId` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果新的訊息持續逾時期間內抵達時，可能會此方法才能繼續執行，直到逾時期間過期且沒有任何新的訊息抵達，或是在訊息抵達其之前<xref:System.Messaging.Message.CorrelationId%2A>符合`correlationId`參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.CorrelationId%2A> property is used to tie a message sent to the queue to associated response, report, or acknowledgment messages.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.CorrelationId%2A>屬性用來將繫結傳送至相關聯的回應、 報表或通知訊息至佇列的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Two other methods allow you to peek messages in a queue.
trans-unit.target: 另外兩個方法可讓您查看佇列中的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A> method returns the first message in the queue, and the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekById%28System.String%29> method is used to retrieve a message by specifying its unique identifier.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A>方法會傳回第一個訊息在佇列中，而<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekById%28System.String%29>方法用來擷取訊息，藉由指定其唯一識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示這個方法中是否有提供各種不同的工作群組模式。

trans-unit.source: Workgroup mode
trans-unit.target: 工作群組模式

trans-unit.source: Available
trans-unit.target: 可用

trans-unit.target: 本機電腦

trans-unit.source: Yes
Local computer and direct format name
trans-unit.target: 本機電腦，並直接格式名稱

trans-unit.source: Yes
Remote computer
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Remote computer and direct format name
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦並直接格式名稱

trans-unit.source: Yes
The following code example demonstrates the use of <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekByCorrelationId%28System.String%2CSystem.TimeSpan%29>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範 <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekByCorrelationId%28System.String%2CSystem.TimeSpan%29> 的用法。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="correlationId" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="correlationId" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The value specified for the <paramref name="timeout" /> parameter is not valid, possibly <paramref name="timeout" /> is less than <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.InfiniteTimeout" />.
trans-unit.target: 為 <paramref name="timeout" /> 參數指定的值無效，可能是 <paramref name="timeout" /> 小於 <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.InfiniteTimeout" />。

trans-unit.source: The message with the specified <paramref name="correlationId" /> does not exist in the queue and did not arrive before the time-out expired.
trans-unit.target: 佇列中沒有具有指定 <paramref name="correlationId" /> 的訊息，且該訊息未在逾時到期前到達。

trans-unit.source: A message did not arrive before the time-out expired.
trans-unit.target: 訊息沒有在逾時到期前到達。

trans-unit.source: -or-
An error occurred when accessing a Message Queuing method.
trans-unit.target: 存取訊息佇列方法時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Returns a copy of the message that has the specified message identifier without removing the message from the queue.
trans-unit.target: 傳回具有指定訊息識別項的訊息複本，但不從佇列中移除訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.Id" /> of the message to peek.
trans-unit.target: 要窺視訊息的 <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.Id" />。

trans-unit.source: Peeks the message whose message identifier matches the <paramref name="id" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 窺視訊息識別項符合 <paramref name="id" /> 參數的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> whose <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.Id" /> property matches the <paramref name="id" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> 屬性符合 <paramref name="id" /> 參數的 <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.Id" />。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekById%28System.String%29> to read, without removing from the queue, a message that has a known message identifier.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekById%28System.String%29>讀取，但不會從佇列移除訊息具有已知的訊息識別項。

trans-unit.source: The identifier of a message is unique across the Message Queuing enterprise, so there will be at most one message in the queue that matches the given `id` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 訊息的識別項是唯一的訊息佇列企業中，因此中會有最多一個訊息佇列符合給定`id`參數。

trans-unit.source: This overload throws an exception if the queue does not currently contain the message.
trans-unit.target: 如果佇列目前也不會包含訊息，則這個多載會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Two additional methods allow you to peek messages in a queue: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A> and <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekByCorrelationId%28System.String%29>.
trans-unit.target: 兩個額外的方法可讓您查看佇列中的訊息：<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A>和<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekByCorrelationId%28System.String%29>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A> method returns the first message in the queue; <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekByCorrelationId%28System.String%29> returns an acknowledgment, report, or application-generated response message that was created as a result of a message sent to the queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A>方法會傳回第一個訊息在佇列中。<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekByCorrelationId%28System.String%29>傳回通知、 報表或已傳送至佇列的訊息後建立的應用程式產生的回應訊息。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示這個方法中是否有提供各種不同的工作群組模式。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="id" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="id" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: No message with the specified <paramref name="id" /> exists.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a Message Queuing method.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.Id" /> of the message to peek.
trans-unit.target: 要窺視訊息的 <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.Id" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that indicates the time to wait until a new message is available for inspection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />，指出等待新訊息可以進行檢查的時間。

trans-unit.source: Peeks the message whose message identifier matches the <paramref name="id" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 窺視訊息識別項符合 <paramref name="id" /> 參數的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Waits until the message appears in the queue or a time-out occurs.
trans-unit.target: 等待直到訊息出現在佇列中，或等到發生逾時。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> whose <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.Id" /> property matches the <paramref name="id" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> 屬性符合 <paramref name="id" /> 參數的 <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.Id" />。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekById%28System.String%29> to read, without removing from the queue, a message that has a known message identifier.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekById%28System.String%29>讀取，但不會從佇列移除訊息具有已知的訊息識別項。

trans-unit.source: The identifier of a message is unique across the Message Queuing enterprise, so there will be at most one message in the queue that matches the given `id` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 訊息的識別項是唯一的訊息佇列企業中，因此中會有最多一個訊息佇列符合給定`id`參數。

trans-unit.source: This overload throws an exception if the queue does not currently contain the message and a new message does not arrive before the time-out occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果佇列目前也不會包含訊息，而且發生逾時前未到達新訊息，則這個多載會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The `timeout` parameter does not specify the total running time for this method.
trans-unit.target: `timeout`參數未指定此方法的執行時間總計。

trans-unit.source: Rather, it specifies the time to wait for a new message to arrive in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，它會指定新訊息到達佇列中等候的時間。

trans-unit.source: Each time a new message arrives, this method examines the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Id%2A> of the new message to see if it matches the `id` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 每次新的訊息抵達時，這個方法會檢查<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Id%2A>新訊息是否符合`id`參數。

trans-unit.source: If not, this method starts the time-out period over and waits for another new message to arrive.
trans-unit.target: 否則，這個方法的逾時期間的開始，並等候另一個新訊息到達。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if new messages continue to arrive within the time-out period, it is possible for this method to continue running indefinitely, either until the time-out period expires without any new messages arriving, or until a message arrives whose <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Id%2A> matches the `id` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果新的訊息持續逾時期間內抵達時，可能會此方法才能繼續執行，直到逾時期間過期且沒有任何新的訊息抵達，或是在訊息抵達其之前<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Id%2A>符合`id`參數。

trans-unit.source: Two additional methods allow you to peek messages in a queue: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A> and <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekByCorrelationId%28System.String%29>.
trans-unit.target: 兩個額外的方法可讓您查看佇列中的訊息：<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A>和<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekByCorrelationId%28System.String%29>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A> method returns the first message in the queue; <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekByCorrelationId%28System.String%29> returns an acknowledgment, report, or application-generated response message that was created as a result of a message sent to the queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A>方法會傳回第一個訊息在佇列中。<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekByCorrelationId%28System.String%29>傳回通知、 報表或已傳送至佇列的訊息後建立的應用程式產生的回應訊息。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範 <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekById%28System.String%2CSystem.TimeSpan%29> 的用法。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="id" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The value specified for the <paramref name="timeout" /> parameter is not valid, possibly <paramref name="timeout" /> is less than <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.InfiniteTimeout" />.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a Message Queuing method.
trans-unit.target: 存取訊息佇列方法時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Introduced in MSMQ 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 在 MSMQ 3.0 中介紹。

trans-unit.source: Peeks at a specific message from the queue.
trans-unit.target: 窺視佇列中的特定訊息。

trans-unit.source: The message can be specified by a lookup identifier or by its position at the front or end of the queue.
trans-unit.target: 訊息可以由查閱識別項指定，或由訊息在佇列前面或結尾的位置來指定。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.LookupId" /> of the message to peek at.
trans-unit.target: 要窺視之訊息的 <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.LookupId" />。

trans-unit.source: Introduced in MSMQ 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 在 MSMQ 3.0 中介紹。

trans-unit.source: Peeks at the message that matches the given lookup identifier from a non-transactional queue.
trans-unit.target: 窺視符合非交易佇列之指定查詢識別項的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> whose <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.LookupId" /> property matches the <paramref name="lookupId" /> parameter passed in.
trans-unit.target: 傳入符合 <paramref name="lookupId" /> 參數的 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.LookupId" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to read a message with a known lookup identifier without removing it from the queue.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法，而不移除它從佇列讀取具有已知的查閱識別項。

trans-unit.source: This method throws an exception immediately if the message is not in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會擲回例外狀況立即訊息是否不在佇列中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.LookupId%2A> property of a message is unique to the queue where the message resides, so there will be at most one message in the queue that matches the given `lookupId` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.LookupId%2A>訊息屬性是唯一的佇列訊息所在的位置，應該會有最多一個訊息在佇列中符合指定`lookupId`參數。

trans-unit.source: To read a message with a specified lookup identifier and remove it from the queue, use the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveByLookupId%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 讀取具有指定的查詢識別碼的訊息，並將它從佇列移除，請使用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveByLookupId%2A>方法。

trans-unit.target: 未安裝 MSMQ 3.0。

trans-unit.source: The message with the specified <paramref name="lookupId" /> could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到具有指定 <paramref name="lookupId" /> 的訊息。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a Message Queuing method.
trans-unit.target: 存取訊息佇列方法時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageLookupAction" /> values, specifying how the message is read in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageLookupAction" /> 值，指定如何在佇列中讀取訊息。

trans-unit.source: Specify one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 請指定下列其中一個選項：

trans-unit.source: <see langword="MessageLookupAction.Current" />: Peeks at the message specified by <c>lookupId</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="MessageLookupAction.Current" />：窺視 <c>lookupId</c> 指定的訊息。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="MessageLookupAction.Next" />: Peeks at the message following the message specified by <c>lookupId</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="MessageLookupAction.Next" />：窺視 <c>lookupId</c> 指定的訊息後面的訊息。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="MessageLookupAction.Previous" />: Peeks at the message preceding the message specified by <c>lookupId</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="MessageLookupAction.Previous" />：窺視 <c>lookupId</c> 指定的訊息前面的訊息。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="MessageLookupAction.First" />: Peeks at the first message in the queue.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="MessageLookupAction.First" />：窺視佇列中的第一則訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <c>lookupId</c> parameter must be set to 0.
trans-unit.target: <c>lookupId</c> 參數必須設定為 0。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="MessageLookupAction.Last" />: Peeks at the last message in the queue.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="MessageLookupAction.Last" />：窺視佇列中的最後一則訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <c>lookupId</c> parameter must be set to 0.
trans-unit.target: <c>lookupId</c> 參數必須設定為 0。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.LookupId" /> of the message to peek at, or 0.
trans-unit.target: 要窺視之訊息的 <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.LookupId" />，或者為 0。

trans-unit.source: 0 is used when accessing the first or last message in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 存取佇列中第一則或最後一則訊息時會使用 0。

trans-unit.source: Introduced in MSMQ 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 在 MSMQ 3.0 中介紹。

trans-unit.source: Peeks at a specific message from the queue.
trans-unit.target: 窺視佇列中的特定訊息。

trans-unit.source: The message can be specified by a lookup identifier or by its position at the front or end of the queue.
trans-unit.target: 訊息可以由查閱識別項指定，或由訊息在佇列前面或結尾的位置來指定。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> specified by the <paramref name="action" /> and <paramref name="lookupId" /> parameters passed in.
trans-unit.target: 傳入之 <paramref name="action" /> 和 <paramref name="lookupId" /> 參數所指定的 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to read a message with a known lookup identifier without removing it from the queue.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法，而不移除它從佇列讀取具有已知的查閱識別項。

trans-unit.source: This method throws an exception immediately if the message is not in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會擲回例外狀況立即訊息是否不在佇列中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.LookupId%2A> property of a message is unique to the queue where the message resides, so there will be at most one message in the queue that matches the given `lookupId` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.LookupId%2A>訊息屬性是唯一的佇列訊息所在的位置，應該會有最多一個訊息在佇列中符合指定`lookupId`參數。

trans-unit.source: To read a message with a specified identifier and remove it from the queue, use the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveByLookupId%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 讀取具有指定識別碼的訊息，並將它從佇列移除，請使用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveByLookupId%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示這個方法中是否有提供各種不同的工作群組模式。

trans-unit.source: Workgroup mode
trans-unit.target: 工作群組模式

trans-unit.source: Available
trans-unit.target: 可用

trans-unit.source: Local computer
trans-unit.target: 本機電腦

trans-unit.source: Yes
Local computer and direct format name
trans-unit.target: 本機電腦，並直接格式名稱

trans-unit.source: Yes
Remote computer
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Remote computer and direct format name
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦並直接格式名稱

trans-unit.source: Yes
MSMQ 3.0 is not installed.
trans-unit.target: 未安裝 MSMQ 3.0。

trans-unit.source: The message with the specified <paramref name="lookupId" /> could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到具有指定 <paramref name="lookupId" /> 的訊息。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a Message Queuing method.
trans-unit.target: 存取訊息佇列方法時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="action" /> parameter is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageLookupAction" /> members.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="action" /> 參數不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageLookupAction" /> 成員。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a message is read without being removed from the queue.
trans-unit.target: 發生於訊息已讀取但未從佇列中移除時。

trans-unit.source: This is a result of the asynchronous operation, <see cref="M:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginPeek" />.
trans-unit.target: 這是非同步作業 <see cref="M:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginPeek" /> 的結果。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginPeek%2A> is used in asynchronous processing to raise the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekCompleted> event when a message is available in the queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginPeek%2A> 在非同步處理用來引發<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekCompleted>事件佇列中出現一則訊息時。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndPeek%28System.IAsyncResult%29> is used to complete the operation initiated by a call to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginPeek%2A> and peek the message when the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekCompleted> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndPeek%28System.IAsyncResult%29> 用來完成作業的呼叫所初始化<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginPeek%2A>和窺視訊息時<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekCompleted>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Messaging.PeekCompletedEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <xref:System.Messaging.PeekCompletedEventHandler> 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an event handler named `MyPeekCompleted`, attaches it to the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekCompleted> event handler delegate, and calls <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginPeek%2A> to initiate an asynchronous peek operation on the queue that is located at the path ".\myQueue".
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立名為事件處理常式`MyPeekCompleted`，將它附加至<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekCompleted>事件處理常式委派，並呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginPeek%2A>起始位於路徑上的佇列上的非同步窺視作業 」。 \myQueue"。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekCompleted> event is raised, the example peeks the message and writes its body to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekCompleted>就會引發事件，此範例窺視訊息，並將其本文寫入至螢幕。

trans-unit.source: The example then calls <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginPeek%2A> again to initiate a new asynchronous peek operation
trans-unit.target: 此範例會接著呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginPeek%2A> 以起始新的非同步查看作業

trans-unit.source: Deletes all the messages contained in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 刪除佇列中所包含的所有訊息。

trans-unit.source: Purging the queue causes Message Queuing to set the queue modification flag, which affects the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.LastModifyTime%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 清除佇列會導致訊息佇列設定的佇列修改旗標，會影響<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.LastModifyTime%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Messages that are purged from the queue are lost; they are not sent to the dead-letter queue or the journal queue.
trans-unit.target: 從佇列中清除的訊息都會遺失。它們不會傳送到寄不出信件佇列或日誌佇列。

trans-unit.target: 工作群組模式

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a Message Queuing method.
trans-unit.target: 存取訊息佇列方法時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the friendly name that identifies the queue.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定識別佇列的易記名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name that identifies the queue referenced by this <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: 名稱，識別這個 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> 所參考的佇列。

trans-unit.source: The value cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值不能為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: You can combine the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.QueueName%2A> with the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MachineName%2A> to create a friendly <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A> name for the queue.
trans-unit.target: 您可以結合<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.QueueName%2A>與<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MachineName%2A>建立易記<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A>佇列的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The syntax for the friendly name variation of the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A> property depends on the type of queue, as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 易記名稱變化的語法<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A>屬性取決於佇列類型下, 表所示。

trans-unit.source: Queue type
trans-unit.target: 佇列類型

trans-unit.source: Syntax
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: Public queue
trans-unit.target: 公用佇列

trans-unit.source: Private queue
trans-unit.target: 私用佇列

trans-unit.source: Journal queue
trans-unit.target: 日誌佇列

trans-unit.source: Use "." to represent the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 使用"。"代表本機電腦。

trans-unit.source: Changing the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.QueueName%2A> property affects the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 變更<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.QueueName%2A>屬性會影響<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.QueueName%2A> without setting the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MachineName%2A> property, the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A> property becomes .\\`QueueName`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.QueueName%2A>未設定<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MachineName%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A>屬性變成。\\`QueueName`.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A> becomes `MachineName`\\`QueueName`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A>變成`MachineName` \\ `QueueName`。

trans-unit.source: The queue name is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 佇列名稱是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the native handle used to read messages from the message queue.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來從訊息佇列讀取訊息的原生控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: A handle to the native queue object that you use for peeking and receiving messages from the queue.
trans-unit.target: 用來從佇列窺視或接收訊息之原生佇列物件的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReadHandle%2A> provides a native Windows handle to the message queue object that is used for peeking and receiving messages from the queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReadHandle%2A>提供用於窺視或從佇列接收訊息的訊息佇列物件的原生 Windows 控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: If you change the path of the queue, the handle is closed and reopened with a new value.
trans-unit.target: 如果您變更佇列的路徑，控制代碼關閉並重新開啟新的值。

An error occurred when accessing a Message Queuing method.
trans-unit.target: 存取訊息佇列方法時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The method is not thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不是安全執行緒。

trans-unit.source: Receives the first message in the queue, removing it from the queue.
trans-unit.target: 接收佇列中的第一個訊息，並將它從佇列中移除。

trans-unit.source: Receives the first message available in the queue referenced by the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: 接收由 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> 參考的第一個在佇列中可用的訊息。

trans-unit.source: This call is synchronous, and blocks the current thread of execution until a message is available.
trans-unit.target: 這個呼叫是同步的，而且會阻礙目前執行的執行緒，直到訊息可以使用。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> that references the first message available in the queue.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" />，參考佇列中的第一個可用訊息。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to receive a message from a queue, or wait until there are messages in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個多載會收到訊息從佇列中，或等到有訊息佇列中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A> method allows for the synchronous reading of a message, thereby removing it from the queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A>方法允許同步讀取一個訊息，因而從佇列移除。

trans-unit.source: Subsequent calls to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A> will return the messages that follow in the queue, or new, higher priority messages.
trans-unit.target: 後續呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A>會傳回跟在佇列中，或新的、 高優先權的訊息的訊息。

trans-unit.source: To read the first message in a queue without removing it from the queue, use the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要讀取佇列中的第一個訊息，而不需移除佇列，使用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A> method always returns the first message in the queue, so subsequent calls to the method return the same message unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A>方法一律會傳回第一個訊息在佇列中，因此方法的後續呼叫會傳回相同的訊息，除非較高優先權的訊息抵達佇列中。

trans-unit.source: Use a call to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A> when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it waits for a message to arrive in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 使用呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A>時可接受進行封鎖並同時等候訊息到達佇列中目前的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: Because this overload of the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A> method specifies an infinite time-out, the application might wait indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 因為此多載的<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A>方法會指定無限逾時、 應用程式可能會無限期等候。

trans-unit.source: If the application processing should continue without waiting for the message, consider using the asynchronous method, <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式處理應該不需等到訊息繼續，請考慮使用非同步的方法， <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A>。

Remote computer
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦並直接格式名稱

The following code example receives a message from a queue and outputs information about that message to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例從佇列接收訊息，並輸出至畫面的訊息的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a Message Queuing method.
trans-unit.target: 存取訊息佇列方法時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Receives the first message available in the transactional queue referenced by the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: 接收由 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> 參考的第一個在交易佇列中可用的訊息。

trans-unit.source: This call is synchronous, and blocks the current thread of execution until a message is available.
trans-unit.target: 這個呼叫是同步的，而且會阻礙目前執行的執行緒，直到訊息可以使用。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> that references the first message available in the queue.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" />，參考佇列中的第一個可用訊息。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to receive a message from a transactional queue using the internal transaction context defined by the `transaction` parameter, or wait until there are messages in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 若要從使用內部交易內容所定義的交易式佇列接收訊息中使用此多載`transaction`參數或等到有訊息佇列中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A> method allows for the synchronous reading of a message, thereby removing it from the queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A>方法允許同步讀取一個訊息，因而從佇列移除。

trans-unit.source: Subsequent calls to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A> will return the messages that follow in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 後續呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A>會傳回佇列中遵循的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Because this method is called on a transactional queue, the message that is received would be returned to the queue if the transaction is aborted.
trans-unit.target: 因為在交易式佇列上呼叫此方法時，收到的訊息會傳回至佇列，如果交易已中止。

trans-unit.source: The message is not permanently removed from the queue until the transaction is committed.
trans-unit.target: 訊息不是永久移除從佇列上，直到交易認可為止。

trans-unit.source: To read the first message in a queue without removing it from the queue, use the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要讀取佇列中的第一個訊息，而不需移除佇列，使用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A> method always returns the first message in the queue, so subsequent calls to the method return the same message unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A>方法一律會傳回第一個訊息在佇列中，因此方法的後續呼叫會傳回相同的訊息，除非較高優先權的訊息抵達佇列中。

trans-unit.source: There is no transaction context associated with a message returned by a call to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 沒有與呼叫所傳回的訊息相關聯交易內容<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A> does not remove any messages in the queue, there would be nothing to roll back by a call to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Abort%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A>不會移除任何訊息佇列中，會是 nothing 回復呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Abort%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Use a call to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A> when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it waits for a message to arrive in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 使用呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A>時可接受進行封鎖並同時等候訊息到達佇列中目前的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: Because this overload of the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A> method specifies an infinite time-out, the application might wait indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 因為此多載的<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A>方法會指定無限逾時、 應用程式可能會無限期等候。

trans-unit.source: If the application processing should continue without waiting for the message, consider using the asynchronous method, <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式處理應該不需等到訊息繼續，請考慮使用非同步的方法， <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示這個方法中是否有提供各種不同的工作群組模式。

trans-unit.source: Workgroup mode
trans-unit.target: 工作群組模式

trans-unit.source: Available
trans-unit.target: 可用

trans-unit.source: Local computer
trans-unit.target: 本機電腦

trans-unit.source: Yes
Local computer and direct format name
trans-unit.target: 本機電腦，並直接格式名稱

trans-unit.source: Yes
Remote computer
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Remote computer and direct format name
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦並直接格式名稱

trans-unit.source: Yes
The following code example connects to a transactional queue on the local computer and sends a message to the queue.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會連接到本機電腦上的交易式佇列，並將訊息傳送至佇列。

trans-unit.source: It then receives the message that contains an order.
trans-unit.target: 然後會收到含有訂單的訊息。

trans-unit.source: If it encounters a non-transactional queue, it will throw and exception and rollback the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果遇到非交易式佇列，則會擲回例外狀況並回復交易。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a Message Queuing method.
trans-unit.target: 存取訊息佇列方法時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The queue is non-transactional.
trans-unit.target: 該佇列是非交易式佇列。

trans-unit.source: The method is not thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不是安全執行緒。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransactionType" /> values, describing the type of transaction context to associate with the message.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransactionType" /> 值，描述要與訊息相關聯的異動內容的類型。

trans-unit.source: Receives the first message available in the queue referenced by the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: 接收由 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> 參考的第一個在佇列中可用的訊息。

trans-unit.source: This call is synchronous, and blocks the current thread of execution until a message is available.
trans-unit.target: 這個呼叫是同步的，而且會阻礙目前執行的執行緒，直到訊息可以使用。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> that references the first message available in the queue.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" />，參考佇列中的第一個可用訊息。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to receive a message from a queue using a transaction context defined by the `transactionType` parameter, or wait until there are messages in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 若要從使用異動內容所定義的佇列接收訊息中使用此多載`transactionType`參數或等到有訊息佇列中。

trans-unit.source: Specify `Automatic` for the `transactionType` parameter if there is already an external transaction context attached to the thread that you want to use to receive the message.
trans-unit.target: 指定`Automatic`如`transactionType`參數，如果已經有外部交易內容附加到您要用來接收訊息的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: Specify `Single` if you want to receive the message as a single internal transaction.
trans-unit.target: 指定`Single`如果您想要接收的訊息當做單一的內部異動。

trans-unit.source: You can specify `None` if you want to receive a message from a transactional queue outside of a transaction context.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定`None`如果您想要從交易內容外部異動式佇列接收訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A> method allows for the synchronous reading of a message, thereby removing it from the queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A>方法允許同步讀取一個訊息，因而從佇列移除。

trans-unit.source: Subsequent calls to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A> will return the messages that follow in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 後續呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A>會傳回佇列中遵循的訊息。

trans-unit.source: If this method is called to receive a message from a transactional queue, the message that is received would be returned to the queue if the transaction is aborted.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個方法呼叫從異動式佇列接收訊息時，收到的訊息將傳回至佇列，如果交易已中止。

trans-unit.source: The message is not permanently removed from the queue until the transaction is committed.
trans-unit.target: 訊息不是永久移除從佇列上，直到交易認可為止。

trans-unit.source: To read the first message in a queue without removing it from the queue, use the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要讀取佇列中的第一個訊息，而不需移除佇列，使用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A> method always returns the first message in the queue, so subsequent calls to the method return the same message unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A>方法一律會傳回第一個訊息在佇列中，因此方法的後續呼叫會傳回相同的訊息，除非較高優先權的訊息抵達佇列中。

trans-unit.source: There is no transaction context associated with a message returned by a call to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 沒有與呼叫所傳回的訊息相關聯交易內容<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A> does not remove any messages in the queue, there would be nothing to roll back by a call to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Abort%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A>不會移除任何訊息佇列中，會是 nothing 回復呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Abort%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Use a call to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A> when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it waits for a message to arrive in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 使用呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A>時可接受進行封鎖並同時等候訊息到達佇列中目前的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: Because this overload of the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A> method specifies an infinite time-out, the application might wait indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 因為此多載的<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A>方法會指定無限逾時、 應用程式可能會無限期等候。

trans-unit.source: If the application processing should continue without waiting for the message, consider using the asynchronous method, <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式處理應該不需等到訊息繼續，請考慮使用非同步的方法， <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示這個方法中是否有提供各種不同的工作群組模式。

trans-unit.target: 工作群組模式
