trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that indicates the time to wait until a new message is available for inspection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />，指出等待新訊息可以進行檢查的時間。

trans-unit.source: Receives the message that matches the given identifier (from a non-transactional queue) and waits until either a message with the specified identifier is available in the queue or the time-out expires.
trans-unit.target: 接收符合指定識別項的訊息 (從非交易佇列中)，並且等待佇列中出現具有指定識別項的訊息，或者逾時到期。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> whose <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.Id" /> property matches the <paramref name="id" /> parameter passed in.
trans-unit.target: 傳入符合 <paramref name="id" /> 參數的 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.Id" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to read a message with a known identifier and remove it from the queue.
trans-unit.target: 讀取具有已知識別碼的訊息，並將它從佇列移除使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: This method returns immediately if the message with the identifier specified by the `id` parameter is in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會立即傳回如果所指定的訊息識別項`id`參數是在佇列中。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the method waits the given period of time for a new message to arrive.
trans-unit.target: 否則，方法會等候指定的一段時間的新訊息到達。

trans-unit.source: If a new message does not arrive before the time-out expires, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果逾時到期前未到達新訊息，則會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The `timeout` parameter does not specify the total running time for this method.
trans-unit.target: `timeout`參數未指定此方法的執行時間總計。

trans-unit.source: Rather, it specifies the time to wait for a new message to arrive in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，它會指定新訊息到達佇列中等候的時間。

trans-unit.source: Each time a new message arrives, this method examines the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Id%2A> of the new message to see if it matches the `id` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 每次新的訊息抵達時，這個方法會檢查<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Id%2A>新訊息是否符合`id`參數。

trans-unit.source: If not, this method starts the time-out period over and waits for another new message to arrive.
trans-unit.target: 否則，這個方法的逾時期間的開始，並等候另一個新訊息到達。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if new messages continue to arrive within the time-out period, it is possible for this method to continue running indefinitely, either until the time-out period expires without any new messages arriving, or until a message arrives whose <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Id%2A> matches the `id` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果新的訊息持續逾時期間內抵達時，可能會此方法才能繼續執行，直到逾時期間過期且沒有任何新的訊息抵達，或是在訊息抵達其之前<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Id%2A>符合`id`參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Id%2A> property of a message is unique across the Message Queuing enterprise, so there will be at most one message in the queue that matches the given `id` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Id%2A>訊息屬性是唯一的訊息佇列企業中，因此會有最多一個訊息符合的佇列中給定`id`參數。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload of <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveById%28System.String%29> when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked as long as new messages continue to arrive in the queue within the time-out period specified by the `timeout` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 使用此多載的<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveById%28System.String%29>時，只要新訊息到達佇列所指定的逾時期間內會繼續封鎖目前的執行緒可接受`timeout`參數。

trans-unit.source: The thread will be blocked for at least the given period of time, or indefinitely if you specified the value <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.InfiniteTimeout> for the `timeout` parameter, or if new messages continue to arrive in the queue within the time-out period specified by the `timeout` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 執行緒會為封鎖至少在特定期間的時間或無限期如果您指定的值<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.InfiniteTimeout>如`timeout`參數，或如果新訊息到達佇列所指定的逾時期間內繼續`timeout`參數。

trans-unit.source: Two other methods allow you to receive messages from a queue.
trans-unit.target: 另外兩個方法可讓您從佇列接收訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A> method returns the first message in the queue, and the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveByCorrelationId%28System.String%29> method is used to retrieve an acknowledgment, report, or application-generated response message that was created as a result of a message sent to the queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A>方法會傳回第一個訊息在佇列中，而<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveByCorrelationId%28System.String%29>方法用來擷取通知、 報表或已傳送至佇列的訊息後建立的應用程式產生的回應訊息。

trans-unit.source: To read a message with a specified identifier without removing it from the queue, use the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekById%28System.String%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要讀取具有指定識別碼的訊息而不需移除佇列，使用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekById%28System.String%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekById%28System.String%29> method always returns the first message in the queue, so subsequent calls to the method return the same message unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekById%28System.String%29>方法一律會傳回第一個訊息在佇列中，因此方法的後續呼叫會傳回相同的訊息，除非較高優先權的訊息抵達佇列中。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示這個方法中是否有提供各種不同的工作群組模式。

trans-unit.source: Workgroup mode
trans-unit.target: 工作群組模式

trans-unit.source: Available
trans-unit.target: 可用

trans-unit.source: Local computer
trans-unit.target: 本機電腦

trans-unit.source: Yes
Local computer and direct format name
trans-unit.target: 本機電腦，並直接格式名稱

trans-unit.source: Yes
Remote computer
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Remote computer and direct format name
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦並直接格式名稱

trans-unit.source: Yes
The following code example demonstrates the use of <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveById%28System.String%2CSystem.TimeSpan%29>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範 <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveById%28System.String%2CSystem.TimeSpan%29> 的用法。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="id" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="id" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The value specified for the <paramref name="timeout" /> parameter is not valid, possibly <paramref name="timeout" /> is less than <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.InfiniteTimeout" />.
trans-unit.target: 為 <paramref name="timeout" /> 參數指定的值無效，可能是 <paramref name="timeout" /> 小於 <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.InfiniteTimeout" />。

trans-unit.source: A message with the specified <paramref name="id" /> did not arrive in the queue before the time-out expired.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定 <paramref name="id" /> 的訊息未在逾時到期前到達佇列中。

trans-unit.source: -or-
An error occurred when accessing a Message Queuing method.
trans-unit.target: 存取訊息佇列方法時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.Id" /> of the message to receive.
trans-unit.target: 要接收訊息的 <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.Id" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that indicates the time to wait until a new message is available for inspection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />，指出等待新訊息可以進行檢查的時間。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Receives the message that matches the given identifier (from a transactional queue) and waits until either a message with the specified identifier is available in the queue or the time-out expires.
trans-unit.target: 接收符合指定識別項的訊息 (從交易佇列中)，並且等待佇列中出現具有指定識別項的訊息，或者逾時到期。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> whose <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.Id" /> property matches the <paramref name="id" /> parameter passed in.
trans-unit.target: 傳入符合 <paramref name="id" /> 參數的 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.Id" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to read a message with a known identifier and remove it from the queue, using the internal transaction context defined by the `transaction` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來讀取具有已知識別碼的訊息，並將它移除從佇列中，使用所定義的內部異動內容`transaction`參數。

trans-unit.source: This method returns immediately if the message with the identifier specified by the `id` parameter is in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會立即傳回如果所指定的訊息識別項`id`參數是在佇列中。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the method waits the given period of time for a new message to arrive.
trans-unit.target: 否則，方法會等候指定的一段時間的新訊息到達。

trans-unit.source: If a new message does not arrive before the time-out expires, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果逾時到期前未到達新訊息，則會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The `timeout` parameter does not specify the total running time for this method.
trans-unit.target: `timeout`參數未指定此方法的執行時間總計。

trans-unit.source: Rather, it specifies the time to wait for a new message to arrive in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，它會指定新訊息到達佇列中等候的時間。

trans-unit.source: Each time a new message arrives, this method examines the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Id%2A> of the new message to see if it matches the `id` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 每次新的訊息抵達時，這個方法會檢查<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Id%2A>新訊息是否符合`id`參數。

trans-unit.source: If not, this method starts the time-out period over and waits for another new message to arrive.
trans-unit.target: 否則，這個方法的逾時期間的開始，並等候另一個新訊息到達。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if new messages continue to arrive within the time-out period, it is possible for this method to continue running indefinitely, either until the time-out period expires without any new messages arriving, or until a message arrives whose <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Id%2A> matches the `id` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果新的訊息持續逾時期間內抵達時，可能會此方法才能繼續執行，直到逾時期間過期且沒有任何新的訊息抵達，或是在訊息抵達其之前<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Id%2A>符合`id`參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Id%2A> property of a message is unique across the Message Queuing enterprise, so there will be at most one message in the queue that matches the given `id` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Id%2A>訊息屬性是唯一的訊息佇列企業中，因此會有最多一個訊息符合的佇列中給定`id`參數。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload of <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveById%28System.String%29> when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked as long as new messages continue to arrive in the queue within the time-out period specified by the `timeout` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 使用此多載的<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveById%28System.String%29>時，只要新訊息到達佇列所指定的逾時期間內會繼續封鎖目前的執行緒可接受`timeout`參數。

trans-unit.source: The thread will be blocked for at least the given period of time, or indefinitely if you specified the value <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.InfiniteTimeout> for the `timeout` parameter, or if new messages continue to arrive in the queue within the timeout period specified by the `timeout` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 執行緒會為封鎖至少在特定期間的時間或無限期如果您指定的值<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.InfiniteTimeout>如`timeout`參數，或如果新訊息到達佇列所指定的逾時期間內繼續`timeout`參數。

trans-unit.source: Because this method is called on a transactional queue, the message that is received would be returned to the queue if the transaction is aborted.
trans-unit.target: 因為在交易式佇列上呼叫此方法時，收到的訊息會傳回至佇列，如果交易已中止。

trans-unit.source: The message is not permanently removed from the queue until the transaction is committed.
trans-unit.target: 訊息不是永久移除從佇列上，直到交易認可為止。

trans-unit.source: Two other methods allow you to receive messages from a queue.
trans-unit.target: 另外兩個方法可讓您從佇列接收訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A> method returns the first message in the queue, and the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveByCorrelationId%28System.String%29> method is used to retrieve an acknowledgment, report, or application-generated response message that was created as a result of a message sent to the queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A>方法會傳回第一個訊息在佇列中，而<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveByCorrelationId%28System.String%29>方法用來擷取通知、 報表或已傳送至佇列的訊息後建立的應用程式產生的回應訊息。

trans-unit.source: To read a message with a specified identifier without removing it from the queue, use the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekById%28System.String%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要讀取具有指定識別碼的訊息而不需移除佇列，使用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekById%28System.String%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekById%28System.String%29> method always returns the first message in the queue, so subsequent calls to the method return the same message, unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekById%28System.String%29>方法一律會傳回第一個訊息在佇列中，因此方法的後續呼叫會傳回相同的訊息，除非較高優先權的訊息抵達佇列中。

trans-unit.source: There is no transaction context associated with a message returned by a call to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekById%28System.String%29>.
trans-unit.target: 沒有與呼叫所傳回的訊息相關聯交易內容<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekById%28System.String%29>。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekById%28System.String%29> does not remove any messages in the queue, there would be nothing to roll back if the transaction were aborted.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekById%28System.String%29>不會移除任何訊息佇列中，就是如果中止的交易已回復並無關聯。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.Id" /> of the message to receive.
trans-unit.target: 要接收訊息的 <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.Id" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that indicates the time to wait until a new message is available for inspection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />，指出等待新訊息可以進行檢查的時間。

trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransactionType" /> 值，描述要與訊息相關聯的異動內容的類型。

trans-unit.source: Receives the message that matches the given identifier and waits until either a message with the specified identifier is available in the queue or the time-out expires.
trans-unit.target: 接收符合指定識別項的訊息，並且等待佇列中出現具有指定識別項的訊息，或者逾時到期。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> whose <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.Id" /> property matches the <paramref name="id" /> parameter passed in.
trans-unit.target: 傳入符合 <paramref name="id" /> 參數的 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.Id" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to read a message with a known identifier and remove it from the queue.
trans-unit.target: 讀取具有已知識別碼的訊息，並將它從佇列移除使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: This method returns immediately if the message with the identifier specified by the `id` parameter is in the queue, using a transaction context defined by the `transactionType` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會立即傳回如果所指定的訊息識別項`id`參數是在佇列中，使用所定義的交易內容`transactionType`參數。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the method waits the given period of time for a new message to arrive.
trans-unit.target: 否則，方法會等候指定的一段時間的新訊息到達。

trans-unit.source: If a new message does not arrive before the time-out expires, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果逾時到期前未到達新訊息，則會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The `timeout` parameter does not specify the total running time for this method.
trans-unit.target: `timeout`參數未指定此方法的執行時間總計。

trans-unit.source: Rather, it specifies the time to wait for a new message to arrive in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，它會指定新訊息到達佇列中等候的時間。

trans-unit.source: Each time a new message arrives, this method examines the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Id%2A> of the new message to see if it matches the `id` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 每次新的訊息抵達時，這個方法會檢查<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Id%2A>新訊息是否符合`id`參數。

trans-unit.source: If not, this method starts the time-out period over and waits for another new message to arrive.
trans-unit.target: 否則，這個方法的逾時期間的開始，並等候另一個新訊息到達。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if new messages continue to arrive within the time-out period, it is possible for this method to continue running indefinitely, either until the time-out period expires without any new messages arriving, or until a message arrives whose <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Id%2A> matches the `id` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果新的訊息持續逾時期間內抵達時，可能會此方法才能繼續執行，直到逾時期間過期且沒有任何新的訊息抵達，或是在訊息抵達其之前<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Id%2A>符合`id`參數。

trans-unit.source: Specify `Automatic` for the `transactionType` parameter if there is already an external transaction context attached to the thread that you want to use to receive the message.
trans-unit.target: 指定`Automatic`如`transactionType`參數，如果已經有外部交易內容附加到您要用來接收訊息的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: Specify `Single` if you want to receive the message as a single internal transaction.
trans-unit.target: 指定`Single`如果您想要接收的訊息當做單一的內部異動。

trans-unit.source: You can specify `None` if you want to receive a message from a transactional queue outside of a transaction context.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定`None`如果您想要從交易內容外部異動式佇列接收訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Id%2A> property of a message is unique across the Message Queuing enterprise, so there will be at most one message in the queue that matches the given `id` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Id%2A>訊息屬性是唯一的訊息佇列企業中，因此會有最多一個訊息符合的佇列中給定`id`參數。

trans-unit.source: If the message with the specified identifier is in a queue other than the one associated with this <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> instance, the message will not be found.
trans-unit.target: 如果具有指定識別碼的訊息是以外與此相關聯的佇列中<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>執行個體，將無法找到訊息。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload of <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveById%28System.String%29> when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked as long as new messages continue to arrive in the queue within the time-out period specified by the `timeout` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 使用此多載的<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveById%28System.String%29>時，只要新訊息到達佇列所指定的逾時期間內會繼續封鎖目前的執行緒可接受`timeout`參數。

trans-unit.source: The thread will be blocked for at least the given period of time, or indefinitely if you specified the value <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.InfiniteTimeout> for the `timeout` parameter, or if new messages continue to arrive in the queue within the time-out period specified by the `timeout` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 執行緒會為封鎖至少在特定期間的時間或無限期如果您指定的值<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.InfiniteTimeout>如`timeout`參數，或如果新訊息到達佇列所指定的逾時期間內繼續`timeout`參數。

trans-unit.source: If this method is called to receive a message from a transactional queue, the message that is received would be returned to the queue if the transaction is aborted.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個方法呼叫從異動式佇列接收訊息時，收到的訊息將傳回至佇列，如果交易已中止。

trans-unit.source: The message is not permanently removed from the queue until the transaction is committed.
trans-unit.target: 訊息不是永久移除從佇列上，直到交易認可為止。

trans-unit.source: Two other methods allow you to receive messages from a queue.
trans-unit.target: 另外兩個方法可讓您從佇列接收訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A> method returns the first message in the queue, and the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveByCorrelationId%28System.String%29> method is used to retrieve an acknowledgment, report, or application-generated response message that was created as a result of a message sent to the queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A>方法會傳回第一個訊息在佇列中，而<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveByCorrelationId%28System.String%29>方法用來擷取通知、 報表或已傳送至佇列的訊息後建立的應用程式產生的回應訊息。

trans-unit.source: To read a message with a specified identifier without removing it from the queue, use the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekById%28System.String%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要讀取具有指定識別碼的訊息而不需移除佇列，使用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekById%28System.String%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekById%28System.String%29> method always returns the first message in the queue, so subsequent calls to the method return the same message unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekById%28System.String%29>方法一律會傳回第一個訊息在佇列中，因此方法的後續呼叫會傳回相同的訊息，除非較高優先權的訊息抵達佇列中。

trans-unit.source: There is no transaction context associated with a message returned by a call to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekById%28System.String%29>.
trans-unit.target: 沒有與呼叫所傳回的訊息相關聯交易內容<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekById%28System.String%29>。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekById%28System.String%29> does not remove any messages in the queue, there would be nothing to roll back if the transaction were aborted.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekById%28System.String%29>不會移除任何訊息佇列中，就是如果中止的交易已回復並無關聯。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes.

trans-unit.target: 工作群組模式

trans-unit.source: Available
trans-unit.target: 可用

trans-unit.source: Local computer
trans-unit.target: 本機電腦

trans-unit.source: Yes
Local computer and direct format name
trans-unit.target: 本機電腦，並直接格式名稱

trans-unit.source: Yes
Remote computer
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Remote computer and direct format name
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦並直接格式名稱

trans-unit.source: Yes
The following code example demonstrates the use of <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveById%28System.String%2CSystem.TimeSpan%2CSystem.Messaging.MessageQueueTransactionType%29>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範 <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveById%28System.String%2CSystem.TimeSpan%2CSystem.Messaging.MessageQueueTransactionType%29> 的用法。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="id" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="id" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The value specified for the <paramref name="timeout" /> parameter is not valid, possibly <paramref name="timeout" /> is less than <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.InfiniteTimeout" />.
trans-unit.target: 為 <paramref name="timeout" /> 參數指定的值無效，可能是 <paramref name="timeout" /> 小於 <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.InfiniteTimeout" />。

trans-unit.source: A message with the specified <paramref name="id" /> did not arrive in the queue before the time-out expired.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定 <paramref name="id" /> 的訊息未在逾時到期前到達佇列中。

trans-unit.source: -or-
An error occurred when accessing a Message Queuing method.
trans-unit.target: 存取訊息佇列方法時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="transactionType" /> parameter is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransactionType" /> members.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="transactionType" /> 參數不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransactionType" /> 成員。

trans-unit.source: Introduced in MSMQ 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 在 MSMQ 3.0 中介紹。

trans-unit.source: Receives a specific message from the queue.
trans-unit.target: 接收佇列中的特定訊息。

trans-unit.source: The message can be specified by a lookup identifier or by its position at the front or end of the queue.
trans-unit.target: 訊息可以由查閱識別項指定，或由訊息在佇列前面或結尾的位置來指定。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.LookupId" /> of the message to receive.
trans-unit.target: 要接收訊息的 <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.LookupId" />。

trans-unit.source: Introduced in MSMQ 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 在 MSMQ 3.0 中介紹。

trans-unit.source: Receives the message that matches the given lookup identifier from a non-transactional queue.
trans-unit.target: 接收符合非交易佇列之指定查詢識別項的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> whose <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.LookupId" /> property matches the <paramref name="lookupId" /> parameter passed in.
trans-unit.target: 傳入符合 <paramref name="lookupId" /> 參數的 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.LookupId" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to read a message with a known lookup identifier and remove it from the queue.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法來讀取訊息與已知的查閱識別項，並從佇列中移除。

trans-unit.source: This method throws an exception immediately if the message is not in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會擲回例外狀況立即訊息是否不在佇列中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.LookupId%2A> property of a message is unique to the queue where the message resides, so there will be at most one message in the queue that matches the given `lookupId` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.LookupId%2A>訊息屬性是唯一的佇列訊息所在的位置，應該會有最多一個訊息在佇列中符合指定`lookupId`參數。

trans-unit.source: To read a message with a specified lookup identifier without removing it from the queue, use the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekByLookupId%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要讀取具有指定的查詢識別碼的訊息而不需移除佇列，使用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekByLookupId%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示這個方法中是否有提供各種不同的工作群組模式。

trans-unit.target: 工作群組模式

trans-unit.target: 可用

trans-unit.target: 本機電腦

trans-unit.source: Yes

trans-unit.source: Yes
Remote computer
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Yes
MSMQ 3.0 is not installed.
trans-unit.target: 未安裝 MSMQ 3.0。

trans-unit.source: The message with the specified <paramref name="lookupId" /> could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到具有指定 <paramref name="lookupId" /> 的訊息。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a Message Queuing method.
trans-unit.target: 存取訊息佇列方法時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageLookupAction" /> values, specifying how the message is read in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageLookupAction" /> 值，指定如何在佇列中讀取訊息。

trans-unit.source: Specify one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 請指定下列其中一個選項：

trans-unit.source: <see langword="MessageLookupAction.Current" />: Receives the message specified by <c>lookupId</c> and removes it from the queue.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="MessageLookupAction.Current" />：接收 <c>lookupId</c> 指定的訊息，並且從佇列中移除。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="MessageLookupAction.Next" />: Receives the message following the message specified by <c>lookupId</c> and removes it from the queue.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="MessageLookupAction.Next" />：接收 <c>lookupId</c> 指定的訊息後面的訊息，並且從佇列中移除。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="MessageLookupAction.Previous" />: Receives the message preceding the message specified by <c>lookupId</c> and removes it from the queue.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="MessageLookupAction.Previous" />：接收 <c>lookupId</c> 指定的訊息前面的訊息，並且從佇列中移除。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="MessageLookupAction.First" />: Receives the first message in the queue and removes it from the queue.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="MessageLookupAction.First" />：接收佇列中的第一則訊息，並且從佇列中移除。

trans-unit.source: The <c>lookupId</c> parameter must be set to 0.
trans-unit.target: <c>lookupId</c> 參數必須設定為 0。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="MessageLookupAction.Last" />: Receives the last message in the queue and removes it from the queue.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="MessageLookupAction.Last" />：接收佇列中的最後一則訊息，並且從佇列中移除。

trans-unit.source: The <c>lookupId</c> parameter must be set to 0.
trans-unit.target: <c>lookupId</c> 參數必須設定為 0。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.LookupId" /> of the message to receive, or 0.
trans-unit.target: 要接收之訊息的 <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.LookupId" />，或者為 0。

trans-unit.source: 0 is used when accessing the first or last message in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 存取佇列中第一則或最後一則訊息時會使用 0。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Introduced in MSMQ 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 在 MSMQ 3.0 中介紹。

trans-unit.source: Receives a specific message from a transactional queue.
trans-unit.target: 接收交易佇列中的特定訊息。

trans-unit.source: The message can be specified by a lookup identifier or by its position at the front or end of the queue.
trans-unit.target: 訊息可以由查閱識別項指定，或由訊息在佇列前面或結尾的位置來指定。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> specified by the <paramref name="lookupId" /> and <paramref name="action" /> parameters passed in.
trans-unit.target: 傳入之 <paramref name="lookupId" /> 和 <paramref name="action" /> 參數所指定的 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to read a message with a known lookup identifier and remove it from the queue, using a transaction context defined by the `transaction` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來讀取具有已知的查閱識別項，並將它移除從佇列中，使用所定義的交易內容`transaction`參數。

trans-unit.source: This method throws an exception immediately if the message is not in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會擲回例外狀況立即訊息是否不在佇列中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.LookupId%2A> property of a message is unique to the queue where the message resides, so there will be at most one message in the queue that matches the given `lookupId` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.LookupId%2A>訊息屬性是唯一的佇列訊息所在的位置，應該會有最多一個訊息在佇列中符合指定`lookupId`參數。

trans-unit.source: Because this method is called on a transactional queue, the message that is received would be returned to the queue if the transaction is aborted.
trans-unit.target: 因為在交易式佇列上呼叫此方法時，收到的訊息會傳回至佇列，如果交易已中止。

trans-unit.source: The message is not permanently removed from the queue until the transaction is committed.
trans-unit.target: 訊息不是永久移除從佇列上，直到交易認可為止。

trans-unit.source: To read a message with a specified identifier without removing it from the queue, use the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekByLookupId%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要讀取具有指定識別碼的訊息而不需移除佇列，使用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekByLookupId%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: There is no transaction context associated with a message returned by a call to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekByLookupId%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 沒有與呼叫所傳回的訊息相關聯交易內容<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekByLookupId%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekByLookupId%2A> does not remove any messages from the queue, there would be nothing to roll back if the transaction were aborted.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekByLookupId%2A>不會移除任何佇列的訊息，就是如果中止的交易已回復並無關聯。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageLookupAction" /> values, specifying how the message is read in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageLookupAction" /> 值，指定如何在佇列中讀取訊息。

trans-unit.source: Specify one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 請指定下列其中一個選項：

trans-unit.source: <see langword="MessageLookupAction.Current" />: Receives the message specified by <c>lookupId</c> and removes it from the queue.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="MessageLookupAction.Current" />：接收 <c>lookupId</c> 指定的訊息，並且從佇列中移除。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="MessageLookupAction.Next" />: Receives the message following the message specified by <c>lookupId</c> and removes it from the queue.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="MessageLookupAction.Next" />：接收 <c>lookupId</c> 指定的訊息後面的訊息，並且從佇列中移除。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="MessageLookupAction.Previous" />: Receives the message preceding the message specified by <c>lookupId</c> and removes it from the queue.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="MessageLookupAction.Previous" />：接收 <c>lookupId</c> 指定的訊息前面的訊息，並且從佇列中移除。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="MessageLookupAction.First" />: Receives the first message in the queue and removes it from the queue.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="MessageLookupAction.First" />：接收佇列中的第一則訊息，並且從佇列中移除。

trans-unit.source: The <c>lookupId</c> parameter must be set to 0.
trans-unit.target: <c>lookupId</c> 參數必須設定為 0。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="MessageLookupAction.Last" />: Receives the last message in the queue and removes it from the queue.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="MessageLookupAction.Last" />：接收佇列中的最後一則訊息，並且從佇列中移除。

trans-unit.source: The <c>lookupId</c> parameter must be set to 0.
trans-unit.target: <c>lookupId</c> 參數必須設定為 0。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.LookupId" /> of the message to receive, or 0.
trans-unit.target: 要接收之訊息的 <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.LookupId" />，或者為 0。

trans-unit.source: 0 is used when accessing the first or last message in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 存取佇列中第一則或最後一則訊息時會使用 0。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransactionType" /> values, describing the type of transaction context to associate with the message.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransactionType" /> 值，描述要與訊息相關聯的異動內容的類型。

trans-unit.source: Introduced in MSMQ 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 在 MSMQ 3.0 中介紹。

trans-unit.source: Receives a specific message from the queue, using the specified transaction context.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的交易內容接收佇列中的特定訊息。

trans-unit.source: The message can be specified by a lookup identifier or by its position at the front or end of the queue.
trans-unit.target: 訊息可以由查閱識別項指定，或由訊息在佇列前面或結尾的位置來指定。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> specified by the <paramref name="action" /> and <paramref name="lookupId" /> parameters passed in.
trans-unit.target: 傳入之 <paramref name="action" /> 和 <paramref name="lookupId" /> 參數所指定的 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to read a message with a known lookup identifier and remove it from the queue, using a transaction context defined by the `transactionType` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來讀取具有已知的查閱識別項，並將它移除從佇列中，使用所定義的交易內容`transactionType`參數。

trans-unit.source: This method throws an exception immediately if the message is not in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會擲回例外狀況立即訊息是否不在佇列中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.LookupId%2A> property of a message is unique to the queue where the message resides, so there will be at most one message in the queue that matches the given `lookupId` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.LookupId%2A>訊息屬性是唯一的佇列訊息所在的位置，應該會有最多一個訊息在佇列中符合指定`lookupId`參數。

trans-unit.source: To read a message with a specified identifier without removing it from the queue, use the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekByLookupId%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要讀取具有指定識別碼的訊息而不需移除佇列，使用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekByLookupId%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: There is no transaction context associated with a message returned by a call to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekByLookupId%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 沒有與呼叫所傳回的訊息相關聯交易內容<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekByLookupId%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekByLookupId%2A> does not remove any messages from the queue, there would be nothing to roll back if the transaction were aborted.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekByLookupId%2A>不會移除任何佇列的訊息，就是如果中止的交易已回復並無關聯。

trans-unit.source: Specify `Automatic` for the `transactionType` parameter if there is already an external transaction context attached to the thread that you want to use to receive the message.
trans-unit.target: 指定`Automatic`如`transactionType`參數，如果已經有外部交易內容附加到您要用來接收訊息的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: Specify `Single` if you want to receive the message as a single internal transaction.
trans-unit.target: 指定`Single`如果您想要接收的訊息當做單一的內部異動。

trans-unit.source: You can specify `None` if you want to receive a message from a transactional queue outside of a transaction context.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定`None`如果您想要從交易內容外部異動式佇列接收訊息。

trans-unit.source: If this method is called to receive a message from a transactional queue, the message that is received would be returned to the queue if the transaction is aborted.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個方法呼叫從異動式佇列接收訊息時，收到的訊息將傳回至佇列，如果交易已中止。

trans-unit.source: The message is not permanently removed from the queue until the transaction is committed.
trans-unit.target: 訊息不是永久移除從佇列上，直到交易認可為止。

trans-unit.target: 工作群組模式

MSMQ 3.0 is not installed.
trans-unit.target: 未安裝 MSMQ 3.0。

trans-unit.source: The message with the specified <paramref name="lookupId" /> could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到具有指定 <paramref name="lookupId" /> 的訊息。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a Message Queuing method.
trans-unit.target: 存取訊息佇列方法時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="action" /> parameter is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageLookupAction" /> members.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="action" /> 參數不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageLookupAction" /> 成員。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="transactionType" /> parameter is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransactionType" /> members.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="transactionType" /> 參數不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransactionType" /> 成員。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a message has been removed from the queue.
trans-unit.target: 發生於從佇列移除訊息時。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised by the asynchronous operation, <see cref="M:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件是由非同步作業 <see cref="M:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive" /> 所引發。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A> is used in asynchronous processing to raise the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted> event when a message is available in the queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A> 在非同步處理用來引發<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted>事件佇列中出現一則訊息時。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29> is used to complete the operation initiated by a call to <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A> and peek the message when the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29> 用來完成作業的呼叫所初始化<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A>和窺視訊息時<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <xref:System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventHandler> 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an event handler named `MyReceiveCompleted`, attaches it to the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted> event handler delegate, and calls <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A> to initiate an asynchronous receive operation on the queue that is located at the path ".\myQueue".
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立名為事件處理常式`MyReceiveCompleted`，將它附加至<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted>事件處理常式委派，並呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A>啟始的非同步接收作業是位於路徑的佇列上 「。 \myQueue"。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted> event is raised, the example receives the message and writes its body to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted>就會引發事件，範例接收訊息，並將其本文寫入至螢幕。

trans-unit.source: The example then calls <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A> again to initiate a new asynchronous receive operation.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會接著呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A> 以起始新的非同步接收作業。

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the properties presented by the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> to reflect the current state of the resource.
trans-unit.target: 重新整理由 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> 所表示的屬性，以反映資源的目前狀態。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Refresh%2A> synchronizes the properties of a <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> with its associated Message Queuing server resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Refresh%2A> 同步處理的屬性<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>與其相關聯的訊息佇列伺服器資源。

trans-unit.source: If any property, such as <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Label%2A> or <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Category%2A>, has changed on the server since the time the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> was created, <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Refresh%2A> updates the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> with the new information.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何內容，例如<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Label%2A>或<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Category%2A>，已經在伺服器上變更以來<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>已建立，<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Refresh%2A>更新<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>以新的資訊。

The following code example demonstrates the use of <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Refresh%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範 <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Refresh%2A> 的用法。

trans-unit.source: Resets the permission list to the operating system's default values.
trans-unit.target: 將使用權限清單重設為作業系統的預設值。

trans-unit.source: Removes any queue permissions you have appended to the default list.
trans-unit.target: 移除任何附加至預設清單的佇列使用權限。

trans-unit.source: When you call <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ResetPermissions%2A>, you return the permission list to its default values.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ResetPermissions%2A>，權限清單返回其預設值。

trans-unit.source: Generally, this grants the queue creator all permissions, and gives the group Everyone the following rights:
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，這所有使用權限，授與佇列建立者，並提供每個使用者群組的下列權限：

trans-unit.source: Get the properties of the queue.
trans-unit.target: 取得佇列的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Get queue permissions.
trans-unit.target: 取得佇列的權限。

trans-unit.source: Write to the queue.
trans-unit.target: 寫入至佇列。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ResetPermissions%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範 <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ResetPermissions%2A> 的用法。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a Message Queuing method.
trans-unit.target: 存取訊息佇列方法時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Sends an object to a queue.
trans-unit.target: 將物件傳送至佇列。

trans-unit.source: The object to send to the queue.
trans-unit.target: 要傳送至佇列的物件。

trans-unit.source: Sends an object to non-transactional queue referenced by this <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: 將物件傳送至這個 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> 參考的非交易佇列。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to send a message that contains the `obj` parameter to the queue referenced by the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>.
trans-unit.target: 傳送訊息，其中包含使用此多載`obj`參數所參照的佇列<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>。

trans-unit.source: The object you send to the queue can be a <xref:System.Messaging.Message> or any managed object.
trans-unit.target: 傳送至佇列的物件可以是<xref:System.Messaging.Message>或任何 managed 的物件。

trans-unit.source: If you send any object other than a <xref:System.Messaging.Message>, the object is serialized and inserted into the body of the message.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不是傳送任何物件<xref:System.Messaging.Message>，物件會序列化並插入至訊息的本文。

trans-unit.source: If you use this overload to send a message to a transactional queue, the message will be sent to the dead-letter queue.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用這個多載，將訊息傳送至異動式佇列，訊息會傳送到寄不出信件佇列。

trans-unit.source: If you want the message to be part of a transaction that contains other messages, use an overload that takes a <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction> or <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransactionType> as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要包含其他訊息是交易的一部分的訊息時，使用多載採用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction>或<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransactionType>做為參數。

trans-unit.source: If you do not set the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Formatter%2A> property before calling <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%28System.Object%29>, the formatter defaults to the <xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未設定<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Formatter%2A>屬性，然後再呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%28System.Object%29>，格式子的預設值為<xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A> property applies to any object other than a <xref:System.Messaging.Message>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A>屬性會套用至任何物件以外<xref:System.Messaging.Message>。

trans-unit.source: If you specify, for example, a label or a priority using the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A> member, these values apply to any message that contains an object that is not of type <xref:System.Messaging.Message> when your application sends it to the queue.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定，例如，標籤或優先順序使用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A>成員，這些值套用到包含的類型不是物件的任何訊息<xref:System.Messaging.Message>當您的應用程式將它傳送至佇列。

trans-unit.source: When sending a <xref:System.Messaging.Message>, the property values set for the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> take precedence over <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A> and the message's <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property takes precedence over the queue's <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Formatter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 當傳送<xref:System.Messaging.Message>，屬性值設定為<xref:System.Messaging.Message>優先於<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A>和訊息<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會優先於佇列的<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Formatter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

The following code example connects to a message queue and sends a message to the queue.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會連接到訊息佇列，並將訊息傳送至佇列。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sends an application-defined `Order` class to a queue and then receives a message from that queue.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將傳送應用程式定義`Order`類別至佇列，然後從該佇列接收訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path" /> property has not been set.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path" /> 屬性尚未設定。

trans-unit.source: -or-
An error occurred when accessing a Message Queuing method.
trans-unit.target: 存取訊息佇列方法時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The object to send to the queue.
trans-unit.target: 要傳送至佇列的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Sends an object to the transactional queue referenced by this <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: 將物件傳送至這個 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> 參考的交易佇列。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to send a message that contains the `obj` parameter to the transactional queue referenced by the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>, using an internal transaction context defined by the `transaction` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 傳送訊息，其中包含使用此多載`obj`異動式佇列所參考的參數<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>，使用內部交易內容所定義`transaction`參數。

trans-unit.source: The object you send to the queue can be a <xref:System.Messaging.Message> or any managed object.
trans-unit.target: 傳送至佇列的物件可以是<xref:System.Messaging.Message>或任何 managed 的物件。

trans-unit.source: If you send any object other than a <xref:System.Messaging.Message>, the object is serialized and inserted into the body of the message.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不是傳送任何物件<xref:System.Messaging.Message>，物件會序列化並插入至訊息的本文。

trans-unit.source: If you use this overload to send a message to a non-transactional queue, the message might be sent to the dead-letter queue without throwing an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用這個多載，將訊息傳送至非交易式佇列，訊息可以傳送到寄不出信件佇列而不擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If you do not set the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Formatter%2A> property before calling <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%28System.Object%29>, the formatter defaults to the <xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未設定<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Formatter%2A>屬性，然後再呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%28System.Object%29>，格式子的預設值為<xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A> property applies to any object other than a <xref:System.Messaging.Message>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A>屬性會套用至任何物件以外<xref:System.Messaging.Message>。

trans-unit.source: If you specify, for example, a label or a priority using the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A> member, these values apply to any message that contains an object that is not of type <xref:System.Messaging.Message> when your application sends it to the queue.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定，例如，標籤或優先順序使用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A>成員，這些值套用到包含的類型不是物件的任何訊息<xref:System.Messaging.Message>當您的應用程式將它傳送至佇列。

trans-unit.source: When sending a <xref:System.Messaging.Message>, the property values set for the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> take precedence over <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A> and the message's <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property takes precedence over the queue's <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Formatter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 當傳送<xref:System.Messaging.Message>，屬性值設定為<xref:System.Messaging.Message>優先於<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A>和訊息<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會優先於佇列的<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Formatter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction> is threading apartment aware, so if your apartment state is `STA`, you cannot use the transaction in multiple threads.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction> 為執行緒的 apartment 感知的功能，因此，如果已 apartment 狀態`STA`，您無法使用多個執行緒中的交易。

trans-unit.source: Visual Basic sets the state of the main thread to `STA`, so you must apply the <xref:System.MTAThreadAttribute> in the `Main` subroutine.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 會將主執行緒的狀態`STA`，因此您必須先套用<xref:System.MTAThreadAttribute>中`Main`副程式。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, sending a transactional message using another thread throws a <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 否則，使用其他執行緒傳送交易式訊息時，會擲回 <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueException> 例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: You apply the <xref:System.MTAThreadAttribute> by using the following fragment.
trans-unit.target: 您套用<xref:System.MTAThreadAttribute>使用下列的片段。

trans-unit.source: Sends an object to the queue referenced by this <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: 將物件傳送至這個 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> 參考的佇列。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to send a message that contains the `obj` parameter to the queue referenced by the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>, using a transaction context defined by the `transactionType` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 傳送訊息，其中包含使用此多載`obj`參數所參照的佇列<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>，使用所定義的交易內容`transactionType`參數。

trans-unit.source: Specify `Automatic` for the `transactionType` parameter if there is already an external transaction context attached to the thread that you want to use to send the message.
trans-unit.target: 指定`Automatic`如`transactionType`參數，如果已經有外部交易內容附加到您要用來傳送訊息的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: Specify `Single` if you want to send the message as a single internal transaction.
trans-unit.target: 指定`Single`如果您想要以單一的內部交易傳送訊息。

trans-unit.source: You can specify `None` if you want to send a transactional message to a non-transactional thread.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定`None`如果您想要將交易式訊息傳送至非交易式的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: The object you send to the queue can be a <xref:System.Messaging.Message> or any managed object.
trans-unit.target: 傳送至佇列的物件可以是<xref:System.Messaging.Message>或任何 managed 的物件。

trans-unit.source: If you send any object other than a <xref:System.Messaging.Message>, the object is serialized and inserted into the body of the message.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不是傳送任何物件<xref:System.Messaging.Message>，物件會序列化並插入至訊息的本文。

trans-unit.source: If you do not set the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Formatter%2A> property before calling <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%28System.Object%29>, the formatter defaults to the <xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未設定<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Formatter%2A>屬性，然後再呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%28System.Object%29>，格式子的預設值為<xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A> property applies to any object other than a <xref:System.Messaging.Message>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A>屬性會套用至任何物件以外<xref:System.Messaging.Message>。

trans-unit.source: If you specify, for example, a label or a priority using the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A> member, these values apply to any message that contains an object that is not of type <xref:System.Messaging.Message> when your application sends it to the queue.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定，例如，標籤或優先順序使用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A>成員，這些值套用到包含的類型不是物件的任何訊息<xref:System.Messaging.Message>當您的應用程式將它傳送至佇列。

trans-unit.source: When sending a <xref:System.Messaging.Message>, the property values set for the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> take precedence over <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A> and the message's <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property takes precedence over the queue's <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Formatter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 當傳送<xref:System.Messaging.Message>，屬性值設定為<xref:System.Messaging.Message>優先於<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A>和訊息<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會優先於佇列的<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Formatter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示這個方法中是否有提供各種不同的工作群組模式。

trans-unit.source: Workgroup mode
trans-unit.target: 工作群組模式

trans-unit.source: Available
trans-unit.target: 可用

trans-unit.source: Local computer
trans-unit.target: 本機電腦

trans-unit.source: Yes
Local computer and direct format name
trans-unit.target: 本機電腦，並直接格式名稱

trans-unit.source: Yes
Remote computer
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Remote computer and direct format name
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦並直接格式名稱

trans-unit.source: Yes
The following code example demonstrates the use of <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%28System.Object%2CSystem.Messaging.MessageQueueTransactionType%29>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範 <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%28System.Object%2CSystem.Messaging.MessageQueueTransactionType%29> 的用法。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="transactionType" /> parameter is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransactionType" /> members.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="transactionType" /> 參數不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransactionType" /> 成員。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path" /> property has not been set.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path" /> 屬性尚未設定。

trans-unit.source: -or-
An error occurred when accessing a Message Queuing method.
trans-unit.target: 存取訊息佇列方法時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The object to send to the queue.
trans-unit.target: 要傳送至佇列的物件。

trans-unit.source: The label of the message.
trans-unit.target: 訊息的標記。

trans-unit.source: Sends an object to the non-transactional queue referenced by this <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> and specifies a label for the message.
trans-unit.target: 將物件傳送至這個 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> 參考的非交易佇列，並指定訊息的標籤。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to send a message that contains the `obj` parameter to the queue referenced by the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>.
trans-unit.target: 傳送訊息，其中包含使用此多載`obj`參數所參照的佇列<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>。

trans-unit.source: With this overload, you can specify the string label that identifies the message.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個多載，指定識別訊息的字串標記。

trans-unit.source: The object you send to the queue can be a <xref:System.Messaging.Message>, a structure, a data object, or any managed object.
trans-unit.target: 傳送至佇列的物件可以是<xref:System.Messaging.Message>、 結構、 資料物件或任何 managed 的物件。

trans-unit.source: If you send any object other than a <xref:System.Messaging.Message>, the object is serialized and inserted into the body of the message.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不是傳送任何物件<xref:System.Messaging.Message>，物件會序列化並插入至訊息的本文。

trans-unit.source: The message label is distinct from the message queue label, but both are application-dependent and have no inherit meaning to Message Queuing.
trans-unit.target: 訊息標籤是不同於訊息佇列的標籤，但兩者都是應用程式相依，而且不會繼承到訊息佇列的意義。

trans-unit.source: If you use this overload to send a message to a transactional queue, the message will be sent to the dead-letter queue.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用這個多載，將訊息傳送至異動式佇列，訊息會傳送到寄不出信件佇列。

trans-unit.source: If you want the message to be part of a transaction that contains other messages, use an overload that takes a <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction> or <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransactionType> as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要包含其他訊息是交易的一部分的訊息時，使用多載採用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction>或<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransactionType>做為參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A> property for this <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> instance must be specified before you send the message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path%2A>屬性這<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>傳送訊息之前，必須指定執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If you do not set the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Formatter%2A> property before calling <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%28System.Object%29>, the formatter defaults to the <xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未設定<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Formatter%2A>屬性，然後再呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%28System.Object%29>，格式子的預設值為<xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A> property applies to any object other than a <xref:System.Messaging.Message>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A>屬性會套用至任何物件以外<xref:System.Messaging.Message>。

trans-unit.source: If you specify, for example, a label or a priority using the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A> member, these values apply to any message that contains an object that is not of type <xref:System.Messaging.Message> when your application sends it to the queue.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定，例如，標籤或優先順序使用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A>成員，這些值套用到包含的類型不是物件的任何訊息<xref:System.Messaging.Message>當您的應用程式將它傳送至佇列。

trans-unit.source: When sending a <xref:System.Messaging.Message>, the property values set for the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> take precedence over <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A> and the message's <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property takes precedence over the queue's <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Formatter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 當傳送<xref:System.Messaging.Message>，屬性值設定為<xref:System.Messaging.Message>優先於<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A>和訊息<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會優先於佇列的<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Formatter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.target: 要傳送至佇列的物件。

trans-unit.source: The label of the message.
trans-unit.target: 訊息的標記。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Sends an object to the transactional queue referenced by this <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> and specifies a label for the message.
trans-unit.target: 將物件傳送至這個 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> 參考的交易佇列，並指定訊息的標籤。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to send a message that contains the `obj` parameter to the transactional queue referenced by the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>, using an internal transaction context defined by the `transaction` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 傳送訊息，其中包含使用此多載`obj`異動式佇列所參考的參數<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>，使用內部交易內容所定義`transaction`參數。

trans-unit.source: With this overload, you can specify the string label that identifies the message.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個多載，指定識別訊息的字串標記。

trans-unit.source: The object you send to the queue can be a <xref:System.Messaging.Message>, a structure, a data object, or any managed object.
trans-unit.target: 傳送至佇列的物件可以是<xref:System.Messaging.Message>、 結構、 資料物件或任何 managed 的物件。

trans-unit.source: If you send any object other than a <xref:System.Messaging.Message>, the object is serialized and inserted into the body of the message.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不是傳送任何物件<xref:System.Messaging.Message>，物件會序列化並插入至訊息的本文。

trans-unit.source: The message label is distinct from the message queue label, but both are application-dependent and have no inherit meaning to Message Queuing.
trans-unit.target: 訊息標籤是不同於訊息佇列的標籤，但兩者都是應用程式相依，而且不會繼承到訊息佇列的意義。

trans-unit.source: If you use this overload to send a message to a non-transactional queue, the message might be sent to the dead-letter queue without throwing an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用這個多載，將訊息傳送至非交易式佇列，訊息可以傳送到寄不出信件佇列而不擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If you do not set the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Formatter%2A> property before calling <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%28System.Object%29>, the formatter defaults to the <xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未設定<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Formatter%2A>屬性，然後再呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%28System.Object%29>，格式子的預設值為<xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A> property applies to any object other than a <xref:System.Messaging.Message>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A>屬性會套用至任何物件以外<xref:System.Messaging.Message>。

trans-unit.source: If you specify, for example, a label or a priority using the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A> member, these values apply to any message that contains an object that is not of type <xref:System.Messaging.Message> when your application sends it to the queue.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定，例如，標籤或優先順序使用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A>成員，這些值套用到包含的類型不是物件的任何訊息<xref:System.Messaging.Message>當您的應用程式將它傳送至佇列。

trans-unit.source: When sending a <xref:System.Messaging.Message>, the property values set for the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> take precedence over <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A> and the message's <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property takes precedence over the queue's <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Formatter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property
trans-unit.target: 當傳送<xref:System.Messaging.Message>，屬性值設定為<xref:System.Messaging.Message>優先於<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A>和訊息<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會優先於佇列的<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Formatter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction> is threading apartment aware, so if your apartment state is `STA`, you cannot use the transaction in multiple threads.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction> 為執行緒的 apartment 感知的功能，因此，如果已 apartment 狀態`STA`，您無法使用多個執行緒中的交易。

trans-unit.source: Visual Basic sets the state of the main thread to `STA`, so you must apply the <xref:System.MTAThreadAttribute> in the `Main` subroutine.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 會將主執行緒的狀態`STA`，因此您必須先套用<xref:System.MTAThreadAttribute>中`Main`副程式。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, sending a transactional message using another thread throws a <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 否則，使用其他執行緒傳送交易式訊息時，會擲回 <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueException> 例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: You apply the <xref:System.MTAThreadAttribute> by using the following fragment.
trans-unit.target: 您套用<xref:System.MTAThreadAttribute>使用下列的片段。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A> property applies to any object other than a <xref:System.Messaging.Message>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A>屬性會套用至任何物件以外<xref:System.Messaging.Message>。

trans-unit.source: If you specify, for example, a label or a priority using the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A> member, these values apply to any message that contains an object that is not of type <xref:System.Messaging.Message> when your application sends it to the queue.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定，例如，標籤或優先順序使用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A>成員，這些值套用到包含的類型不是物件的任何訊息<xref:System.Messaging.Message>當您的應用程式將它傳送至佇列。

trans-unit.source: When sending a <xref:System.Messaging.Message>, the property values set for the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> take precedence over <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A>, and the message's <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property takes precedence over the queue's <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Formatter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 當傳送<xref:System.Messaging.Message>，屬性值設定為<xref:System.Messaging.Message>優先於<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend%2A>，和訊息<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Formatter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會優先於佇列的<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Formatter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.target: 工作群組模式

trans-unit.target: 本機電腦

trans-unit.source: Yes
Local computer and direct format name

trans-unit.source: Yes
Remote computer
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Remote computer and direct format name
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦並直接格式名稱

trans-unit.source: Yes
The following code example demonstrates the use of <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%28System.Object%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Messaging.MessageQueueTransactionType%29>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範 <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send%28System.Object%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Messaging.MessageQueueTransactionType%29> 的用法。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="label" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="label" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The Message Queuing application indicated an incorrect transaction usage.
trans-unit.target: 訊息佇列應用程式指出不正確的交易使用方式。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="transactionType" /> parameter is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransactionType" /> members.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="transactionType" /> 參數不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransactionType" /> 成員。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path" /> property has not been set.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Path" /> 屬性尚未設定。

trans-unit.source: -or-
An error occurred when accessing a Message Queuing method.
trans-unit.target: 存取訊息佇列方法時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Adds permissions to the current set.
trans-unit.target: 將使用權限加入至目前集合。

trans-unit.source: This controls who has access rights to queue properties and messages in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 這控制誰有權限可存取佇列屬性和佇列中的訊息。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Messaging.AccessControlList" /> that contains one or more access control entries that specify the trustees and the permissions to grant.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Messaging.AccessControlList" />，包含指定信任項和要授與之使用權限的一個或多個存取控制項目。

trans-unit.source: Assigns access rights to the queue based on the contents of an access control list.
trans-unit.target: 根據存取控制清單的內容指派佇列的存取權限。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to grant, deny, or revoke rights by using a collection of access control entries to specify trustee and permissions information.
trans-unit.target: 使用此多載來授與、 拒絕或撤銷權限使用集合的存取控制項目指定信任者和權限資訊。

trans-unit.source: This is used, for example, to grant permissions to multiple users at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 這會使用，例如，同時授與權限給多個使用者。

trans-unit.source: The trustee you specify when you construct the `ace` parameter can be an individual user, a group of users, or a computer.
trans-unit.target: 您指定當您建構的信任者`ace`參數可以是個別使用者、 使用者、 群組或電腦。

trans-unit.source: If the trustee is an individual, use the format `DOMAIN`\\`user`.
trans-unit.target: 如果個別之信任項目，使用格式`DOMAIN` \\ `user`。

trans-unit.source: You can specify "." for the trustee to indicate the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定"。"表示本機電腦信任項。

trans-unit.source: The permissions you assign through <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.SetPermissions%2A> add rights to the existing list.
trans-unit.target: 您透過指派權限<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.SetPermissions%2A>新增至現有清單的權限。

trans-unit.source: By default, the creator of a public or private queue has full control, and the domain group Everyone has permission to get queue properties, get permissions, and write to the queue.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，公用或私用佇列的建立者擁有完整控制權，而且每個人都已取得佇列屬性，取得權限，然後再寫入佇列的權限的網域群組。

trans-unit.source: When you call <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.SetPermissions%2A>, the user and permissions information is appended to the bottom of the existing list.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.SetPermissions%2A>，使用者和權限的資訊會附加至現有清單的底部。

trans-unit.source: The system examines each <xref:System.Messaging.AccessControlEntry> in sequence until one of the following events occurs:
trans-unit.target: 系統會檢查每個<xref:System.Messaging.AccessControlEntry>順序，直到發生下列事件之一為止：

trans-unit.source: An access-denied <xref:System.Messaging.AccessControlEntry> explicitly denies any of the requested access rights to one of the trustees listed in the thread's access token.
trans-unit.target: 拒絕存取時<xref:System.Messaging.AccessControlEntry>明確拒絕任何要求的存取權限，其中一個執行緒的存取權杖中所列的信任。

trans-unit.source: One or more access-allowed <xref:System.Messaging.AccessControlEntry> items for trustees listed in the thread's access token explicitly grant all the requested access rights.
trans-unit.target: 一或多個允許存取的<xref:System.Messaging.AccessControlEntry>明確列出的執行緒存取權杖中的信任者授與所有要求的存取權限的項目。

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.Messaging.AccessControlEntry> items have been checked and there is still at least one requested access right that has not been explicitly allowed, in which case, access is implicitly denied.
trans-unit.target: 所有<xref:System.Messaging.AccessControlEntry>已檢查的項目，而且沒有仍在至少一個要求的存取權限未明確允許，在此情況下，會隱含拒絕存取。

trans-unit.source: When you construct the `dacl` parameter, you add <xref:System.Messaging.AccessControlEntry> instances to your <xref:System.Messaging.AccessControlList> collection.
trans-unit.target: 當您建構`dacl`新增參數，<xref:System.Messaging.AccessControlEntry>執行個體來您<xref:System.Messaging.AccessControlList>集合。

trans-unit.source: When you construct each access control entry, you can specify generic or standard access rights.
trans-unit.target: 當您建構每個存取控制項目時，您可以指定一般或標準存取權限。

trans-unit.source: The rights to a queue can be any combination of the following:
trans-unit.target: 佇列的權限可以是下列任何組合：

trans-unit.source: Delete
trans-unit.target: 刪除

trans-unit.source: Read Security
trans-unit.target: 讀取安全性

trans-unit.source: Write Security
trans-unit.target: 寫入安全性

trans-unit.source: Synchronize
trans-unit.target: 同步處理

trans-unit.source: Modify Owner
trans-unit.target: 修改擁有者

trans-unit.source: Read
trans-unit.target: 讀取

trans-unit.source: Write
trans-unit.target: Write

trans-unit.source: Execute
trans-unit.target: 執行

trans-unit.source: Required
trans-unit.target: 必要

trans-unit.source: All
trans-unit.target: 全部

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: These rights are a set of bit flags that you can combine using the OR bitwise operator.
trans-unit.target: 這些權限，您可以使用位元 OR 運算子來結合的位元旗標組。

trans-unit.source: Full Control
trans-unit.target: 完全控制

trans-unit.source: Delete Message
trans-unit.target: 刪除訊息

trans-unit.source: Receive Message
trans-unit.target: 接收訊息

trans-unit.source: Peek Message
trans-unit.target: 查看訊息

trans-unit.source: Receive Journal Message
trans-unit.target: 接收日誌訊息

trans-unit.source: Get Queue Properties
trans-unit.target: 取得佇列屬性

trans-unit.source: Set Queue Properties
trans-unit.target: 設定佇列屬性

trans-unit.source: Get Permissions
trans-unit.target: 取得權限

trans-unit.source: Set Permissions
trans-unit.target: 設定權限

trans-unit.source: Take Queue Ownership
trans-unit.target: 取得佇列的擁有權

trans-unit.source: Write Message
trans-unit.target: 寫入訊息

trans-unit.source: By default, the creator of a public or private queue has full control, and the domain group Everyone has permission to get queue properties, get permissions, and write to the queue.

trans-unit.source: An access-denied <xref:System.Messaging.AccessControlEntry> explicitly denies any of the requested access rights to one of the trustees listed in the thread's access token.

trans-unit.source: The rights to a queue, which you specify in the `rights` parameter when you construct your <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueAccessControlEntry>, can be any combination of the following:

trans-unit.source: It represents a set of bit flags that you can combine using the bitwise operator OR when you build the `rights` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 它代表一組您可以使用位元運算子來結合的位元旗標或當您建置`rights`參數。
